HEADLINE: XRP begins the week bullish, targets a new ATH: check forecast
SUMMARY: July is shaping up to be one of the most bullish months for the crypto market this year. The market has opened bullish for the third consecutive week, with altcoins performing excellently. Bitcoin, the leading crypto by market cap, has been consolidating around the $118k level over the past few days. Ether hit the $3,800 mark a few hours ago while Dogecoin leads the charge. XRP has also opened the week bullish and could target a new all-time high over the next few hours or days. XRP finds key support level at $3.40 XRP, the native coin of the Ripple ecosystem, is one of the best performers among the top 10 cryptocurrencies in the last 24 hours. The coin is up 3.5% during that period and now trades at $3.535. The positive performance comes as the broader crypto market remains extremely bullish. XRP added over 20% to its value last week, hitting a high of $3.66 for the first time in roughly eight years. XRP slightly dropped over the weekend, establishing a strong support level around $3.40. The hopes of a spot XRP exchange-traded fund (ETF) and the resolution of Ripple‚Äôs case with the SEC are crucial to the inflow of institutional funds into the XRP market. Furthermore, the passing of the GENIUS Act last week was a net positive for US-based crypto projects. The regulatory clarity in the country could increase cryptocurrency adoption, resulting in higher prices for XRP and other leading coins. XRP targets a new all-time high The XRP/USD 4-hour chart is bullish but inefficient, suggesting that the coin could dip lower before rallying higher. The technical indicators are bullish following XRP‚Äôs rally over the last few days. The RSI of 66 shows that XRP is currently bullish, but not in the overbought region, indicating further room for growth. The MACD lines are also in the bullish region, suggesting a bullish bias. With XRP establishing strong support at $3,40, it could extend the rally toward last week‚Äôs high of $3.66. According to CoinMarketCap, XRP‚Äôs all-time high is $3.84, which it reached in January 2018. A successful close above last week‚Äôs high will extend the rally toward its 141.40% Fibonacci extension level at $4.10, drawn from the January high of $3.40 to the April low of $1.61. However, the market has been extremely bullish over the past few weeks and could experience some selling pressure. If that happens, XRP faces a correction and a retest of the $3.40 support level. An extended bearish run would see XRP drop to the Inducement Liquidity (ILQ) level at $3.168 over the coming hours or days. The post XRP begins the week bullish, targets a new ATH: check forecast appeared first on Invezz

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Exchange Binance Announces Support for This Altcoin''s Network Upgrade and Hard Fork! Here Are the Details
SUMMARY: Binance has announced its full support for the upcoming network upgrade and hard fork of the Shentu (CTK) network. The process will begin around 4:00 PM on Tuesday, July 22, 2025, at block height 24,865,200. Binance to Support Shentu (CTK) Network Upgrade and Hard Fork To maximize user experience, Binance will temporarily suspend deposits and withdrawals of tokens on the Shentu (CTK) network starting at 3:00 PM on July 22, 2025. However, trading of tokens on the network will not be affected. Binance stated that it will handle all technical requirements on behalf of its users. Once the upgrade is complete and the network is stable, token deposits and withdrawals will automatically reopen. No further announcements will be made regarding this matter. What is Shentu Network? Shentu (formerly CertiK Chain) is a security-focused blockchain network known for providing smart contract security and auditing services for blockchain projects. The network''s new upgrade is expected to bring several improvements in performance, security, and scalability. This development once again demonstrates Binance''s continued user-friendly approach and technical support in network upgrades. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Bitcoin Exchange Binance Announces Support for This Altcoin''s Network Upgrade and Hard Fork! Here Are the Details

HEADLINE: ‚ÄúBUBBLES Are About to Start BUSTING‚Äù: Robert Kiyosaki Predicts Crash Across All Markets
SUMMARY: The post ‚ÄúBUBBLES Are About to Start BUSTING‚Äù: Robert Kiyosaki Predicts Crash Across All Markets appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The new week kicks off with strong momentum in the crypto market , as prices continue to climb and investor interest grows. The total crypto market cap is nearing $4 trillion, driven by rising participation. Bitcoin is trading at $118,366, up slightly in the past 24 hours, while altcoins like Ethereum, XRP, and Dogecoin are showing strong double-digit monthly gains . Despite positive developments like historic crypto bills , a tariff pause, and the Fed holding interest rates steady , some analysts warn of deeper issues forming beneath the surface. While many are preparing for a bull run, Robert Kiyosaki is preparing for a bubble burst, planning to buy more Bitcoin if prices crash. Here‚Äôs his famous Bubble Warning resurfacing again. Kiyosaki Sees All Bubble Burst Kiyosaki, the author of Rich Dad Poor Dad, has once again voiced his fears of an incoming financial meltdown. In a recent X post, he warned that multiple market bubbles are about to burst. He believes that this event will not only affect stocks but will also impact assets that are often seen as safe havens, including gold, silver, and Bitcoin. BUBBLES are about to start BUSTING. When bubbles bust odds are gold, silver, and Bitcoin will bust too. Good news. If prices of gold, silver, and Bitcoin crash‚Ä¶. I will be buying. Take care. ‚Äî Robert Kiyosaki (@theRealKiyosaki) July 21, 2025 Earlier this year, Kiyosaki cheered Bitcoin‚Äôs new high above $120,000 but warned investors not to get greedy, using the phrase ‚ÄúPigs get fat, hogs get slaughtered.‚Äù While he still believes in Bitcoin, gold, and silver long-term, he‚Äôs now sounding more cautious, hinting that even strong supporters are growing concerned about short-term risks as prices keep climbing. US Debt Adds to the Pressure His warning comes at a time when the US national debt has surged past $34.9 trillion. Interest payments alone are becoming one of the largest government expenses, raising serious concerns about the sustainability of the current financial system. Many believe this ballooning debt could trigger wider instability and deepen the impact of any market crash. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : Charles Hoskinson Responds to ADA Misappropriation Claims with IOG Transparency Audit , Buy the Dip: Crypto May Fall Before It Rises Kiyosaki says that when the bubble pops, most asset classes, including crypto, could face a sharp correction. Instead, he sees it as a rare chance to accumulate gold, silver, and Bitcoin at lower prices, expecting a strong recovery in the long run. $BTC is getting ready for a big move Bitcoin is moving inside a triangle pattern and staying above strong support around $116,000 to $117,000. Right now, it''s going sideways but not for long. What‚Äôs happening: Price is stuck under a red trendline (downward pressure). It‚Äôs stuck in a triangle pattern, holding strong above $116K support while facing downward pressure. If it breaks upward, it could shoot to $125K , but if support fails, it might drop to $111K. HEADLINE: Bitcoin: H100‚Äôs Bold $1.5M Move to Boost Holdings
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin: H100‚Äôs Bold $1.5M Move to Boost Holdings In the dynamic world of digital assets, a significant development is capturing the attention of investors and market observers alike: a Swedish health tech company, H100, has successfully raised 14.1 million Swedish kronor, equivalent to approximately $1.5 million, with the explicit purpose of acquiring more Bitcoin . This strategic move highlights a growing trend among corporations to integrate digital currencies into their treasury strategies, underscoring a deepening belief in the long-term value proposition of Bitcoin . Currently holding 370 BTC, H100‚Äôs decision to further expand its digital asset portfolio signals a bold step in the evolving landscape of corporate finance. Bitcoin‚Äôs Growing Appeal: Why H100 is Investing Big? The recent capital raise by H100 for additional Bitcoin acquisition isn‚Äôt just a headline; it‚Äôs a testament to the cryptocurrency‚Äôs increasing acceptance as a legitimate asset class, even within non-traditional sectors like health tech. What drives a company like H100, primarily focused on health innovation, to make such a substantial investment in Bitcoin ? The motivations are multifaceted and align with several key narratives surrounding digital assets: Inflation Hedge: In an era of economic uncertainty and fluctuating fiat currency values, companies are increasingly looking for assets that can preserve or even grow purchasing power. Bitcoin , often dubbed ‚Äúdigital gold,‚Äù is seen by many as a robust hedge against inflation due to its finite supply. Digital Gold Narrative: Similar to gold, Bitcoin‚Äôs scarcity and decentralized nature make it an attractive store of value. Companies are diversifying their treasury reserves beyond traditional cash and bonds, viewing Bitcoin as a modern alternative. Long-Term Value Appreciation: Beyond short-term volatility, many institutional investors and corporations believe in Bitcoin‚Äôs potential for significant long-term appreciation. They view current prices as an opportune entry point for future growth. Diversification of Treasury Assets: Holding a portion of corporate reserves in Bitcoin provides diversification, potentially reducing overall portfolio risk by introducing an asset with a low correlation to traditional financial markets. H100‚Äôs move suggests a sophisticated understanding of these underlying drivers, positioning them not just as a health tech innovator but also as a forward-thinking entity in corporate finance. The Strategic Play: How H100‚Äôs Bitcoin Acquisition Fits In? For H100, this $1.5 million capital raise isn‚Äôt merely about buying more Bitcoin ; it‚Äôs about making a strategic statement and strengthening their financial foundation. The decision to publicly announce this intent, as reported by market observers, adds a layer of transparency and confidence to their digital asset strategy. Their existing holding of 370 BTC already places them among a select group of companies with significant cryptocurrency exposure. Expanding this position indicates: Commitment to Digital Assets: It signals a long-term commitment to Bitcoin as a core component of their treasury strategy, rather than a speculative short-term venture. Confidence in Future Growth: By increasing their holdings, H100 is effectively voting with its capital on the future growth and stability of the Bitcoin network and ecosystem. Pioneering Spirit: While not the first, a health tech company making such a move sets a precedent within its industry, potentially encouraging others to explore similar avenues. Enhanced Financial Resilience: A diversified treasury, including a strong allocation to a perceived inflation-resistant asset like Bitcoin , can enhance a company‚Äôs financial resilience against macroeconomic shifts. This strategic allocation reflects a nuanced understanding of global economic trends and the potential for digital assets to play a crucial role in future corporate balance sheets. Examining the Trend: Is Corporate Bitcoin Adoption the New Normal? H100‚Äôs latest fundraising round for Bitcoin acquisition is not an isolated incident but rather a prominent example of a broader trend. Over the past few years, a growing number of publicly traded and private companies have added Bitcoin to their balance sheets. This shift represents a significant evolution in corporate finance, moving beyond traditional asset classes. However, this trend comes with its own set of considerations: Benefits of Corporate Bitcoin Holdings: Benefit Description Inflation Hedge Protection against the devaluation of fiat currencies. Store of Value A durable asset for long-term wealth preservation. Diversification Reduces portfolio risk by adding a non-correlated asset. Innovation & Future-Proofing Positions the company as forward-thinking and adaptable to new financial paradigms. Potential Appreciation Opportunity for significant capital gains over time. Challenges and Considerations: Volatility: Bitcoin is known for its price fl

HEADLINE: Hoskinson Vows to Livestream ADA Audit Report as August Release Nears
SUMMARY: Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson says an audit of Input Output Global‚Äôs (IOG) ADA holdings is nearly ready for public release, with plans to livestream the full report once finalized. Key Takeaways: Charles Hoskinson says the audit of IOG‚Äôs ADA holdings is on track for a mid-August release. The audit follows serious allegations of $600M ADA misappropriation, which Hoskinson denies. Hoskinson plans legal action against accusers. In a recent post on X , Hoskinson said the report is ‚Äúshaping up quickly‚Äù after he requested more context and transparency in several key sections. ‚ÄúI believe we are on schedule for a mid-August release, assuming the work continues at this pace and there are no delays,‚Äù Hoskinson said Saturday. Hoskinson Faces Scrutiny Amid $600M ADA Misappropriation Allegations The audit follows a wave of accusations leveled earlier this year, including claims that Hoskinson misappropriated $600 million in ADA through manipulation of the Cardano ledger. One allegation, made by NFT artist Masato Alexander, accused Hoskinson of using a ‚Äúgenesis key‚Äù to seize control of $619 million during Cardano‚Äôs 2021 Allegra hard fork. Hoskinson has denied the allegations and said he was ‚Äúdeeply hurt‚Äù by the erosion of trust within the community. ‚ÄúIOG never gave itself 350 million unclaimed ADA. This is a lie,‚Äù he wrote in May. ‚ÄúThe vast majority was claimed, and the remaining that was forfeited after seven years of waiting was donated to Intersect.‚Äù Hoskinson pledged to make the audit public via a dedicated website and said the livestreamed reading would provide full transparency. The site will also include ‚Äúhistorical artifacts from the sale,‚Äù he added. Beyond the audit, Hoskinson is considering legal options against those who made the allegations. ‚ÄúMeeting with the defamation law firm next week to discuss options and strategy,‚Äù he said. Meeting with the defamation law firm next week to discuss options and strategy. ‚Äî Charles Hoskinson (@IOHK_Charles) July 20, 2025 At the time of writing, ADA is trading at $0.8842, up by more than 5% over the past day, according to data from CoinMarketCap. The token is up more than 51% over the past month but still down by 73% compared to its all-time high of $3.10 registered in early 2021. Cardano Aims for DeFi Expansion with Stablecoin Talks Earlier this month, Hoskinson confirmed talks with Circle and Tether to bring stablecoins USDC and USDT to the Cardano network. While the Cardano community sees this as a bullish development, Hoskinson cautioned that adding stablecoins alone won‚Äôt revolutionize the ecosystem. Hoskinson argued that the presence of major stablecoins won‚Äôt ‚Äúmagically supercharge‚Äù Cardano‚Äôs DeFi space. Instead, he emphasized the need for foundational infrastructure and user adoption to grow the ecosystem beyond hype. IOG talks to Circle every 1-2 months and to Tether numerous times. The $100M stablecoin SWF + Bitcoin DeFi + thriving DeFi can bring in USDC and USDT. Or the Cardano Foundation can pay $23M and mint a bunch of liquidity, which they won''t. (jump to 5m40s) #Cardano pic.twitter.com/i9YMB2cY8a ‚Äî St‚Ç≥ke with Pride SPO & DRep (@StakeWithPride) July 6, 2025 Last month, Hoskinson introduced Cardinal , a new protocol designed to bring Bitcoin-native DeFi to Cardano. The protocol allows Bitcoin holders to access Cardano‚Äôs smart contracts and low fees, while maintaining BTC‚Äôs liquidity and trustless nature. Cardinal uses a non-custodial wrapping model built on MuSig2, HTLCs, and BitVMX to create wrapped BTC and Ordinals for lending, borrowing, and trading. These assets are pegged 1:1, transferable, and redeemable with fraud-proof mechanisms‚Äîavoiding rehypothecation and centralized custody risks. The protocol aims to bridge Bitcoin‚Äôs capital with Cardano‚Äôs programmability, and is compatible with other Layer 1 chains. The post Hoskinson Vows to Livestream ADA Audit Report as August Release Nears appeared first on Cryptonews .
text: Hoskinson Vows to Livestream ADA Audit Report as August Release Nears. Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson says an audit of Input Output Global‚Äôs (IOG) ADA holdings is nearly ready for public release, with plans to livestream the full report once finalized. Key Takeaways: Charles Hoskinson says the audit of IOG‚Äôs ADA holdings is on track for a mid-August release. The audit follows serious allegations of $600M ADA misappropriation, which Hoskinson denies. Hoskinson plans legal action against accusers. In a recent post on X , Hoskinson said the report is ‚Äúshaping up quickly‚Äù after he requested more context and transparency in several key sections. ‚ÄúI believe we are on schedule for a mid-August release, assuming the work continues at this pace and there are no delays,‚Äù Hoskinson said Saturday. Hoskinson Faces Scrutiny Amid $600M ADA Misappropriation Allegations The audit follows a wave of accusations leveled earlier this year, including claims that Hoskinson misappropriated $600 million in ADA through manipulation of the Cardano ledger. One allegation, made by NFT artist Masato Alexander, accused Hoskinson of using a ‚Äúgenesis key‚Äù to seize control of $619 million during Cardano‚Äôs 2021 Allegra hard fork. Hoskinson has denied the allegations and said he was ‚Äúdeeply hurt‚Äù by the erosion of trust within the community. ‚ÄúIOG never gave itself 350 million unclaimed ADA. This is a lie,‚Äù he wrote in May. ‚ÄúThe vast majority was claimed, and the remaining that was forfeited after seven years of waiting was donated to Intersect.‚Äù Hoskinson pledged to make the audit public via a dedicated website and said the livestreamed reading would provide full transparency. The site will also include ‚Äúhistorical artifacts from the sale,‚Äù he added. Beyond the audit, Hoskinson is considering legal options against those who made the allegations. ‚ÄúMeeting with the defamation law firm next week to discuss options and strategy,‚Äù he said. HEADLINE: Japan‚Äôs yen rose after Ishiba‚Äôs party lost the election
SUMMARY: The Japanese yen jumped early Monday, catching traders off guard just hours after Shigeru Ishiba‚Äôs ruling party suffered a historic blow in the July 20 upper-house election. At 11 a.m. Tokyo time (10 p.m. ET Sunday), the yen strengthened 0.22% against the U.S. dollar, rising to 148.49, after sinking for two straight weeks on fears that Ishiba‚Äôs government would lose its parliamentary majority. Despite the defeat, the yen (still seen as a fallback when global tensions climb) found buyers fast. The currency‚Äôs two-week slide had tracked voter polls showing Ishiba‚Äôs administration in trouble. That forecast turned out right. But rather than spiral, the yen rebounded as investors processed the fallout. The safe-haven logic kicked in: with global markets unstable and Washington turning up trade pressure, Japan‚Äôs currency became the lesser evil. The sharp swing also came as markets across the Asia-Pacific opened the week on a volatile note. China leaves lending rates unchanged as yuan stays flat Over in China, the People‚Äôs Bank of China decided Monday to hold both its 1-year and 5-year loan prime rates steady, adding to the cautious tone across regional markets. The offshore yuan barely moved. By 9:50 a.m. local time (9:50 p.m. ET Sunday), it nudged up just 0.02%, landing at 7.1788 per dollar. The message from Beijing was clear: no rate cuts, no stimulus surprises, at least for now. Stocks in Hong Kong and mainland China started Monday on the front foot. The Hang Seng Index was up 0.55% and the CSI 300 rose 0.28% as of 9:42 a.m. local time (9:42 p.m. ET Tuesday). That bounce came right after the central bank‚Äôs move to keep its main borrowing rates unchanged. But the optimism was cautious, as most investors remained focused on external threats, especially trade. In Washington, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick warned Sunday that August 1 would be the ‚Äúhard deadline‚Äù for countries to start paying tariffs. He added, ‚ÄúNothing stops countries from talking to us after August 1,‚Äù suggesting negotiations can continue, just not without cost. The U.S. position has once again rattled Asia‚Äôs exporters, with currency and stock traders trying to gauge how far this pressure will go. Singapore‚Äôs dollar weakens while stocks keep running Singapore‚Äôs currency is getting squeezed. The Singapore dollar, already under strain as the U.S. dollar rallies, came under more pressure Monday. The White House‚Äôs latest threat of new tariffs , especially on pharmaceuticals and semiconductors, hit hard. Those two sectors are among Singapore‚Äôs top exports. And with trade risks rising, analysts at Barclays Plc and Asia Decoded Pte. are now saying the Monetary Authority of Singapore could ease its exchange-rate policy as early as this month. The speculation over policy easing comes as Singapore tries to shield its economy from external shocks. The stronger dollar and tariff threats are stacking up fast. Still, despite the pressure, the city-state‚Äôs Straits Times Index is on a roll. On Monday, the benchmark climbed for an 11th straight session, hitting a new high of 4,225.79 before pulling back slightly to 4,215.22 by 10:10 a.m. local time (10:10 p.m. ET). The biggest gains came from the utilities, financials, and real estate sectors. Top movers included Mapletree Logistics Trust, which rose 1.69%, Yangzijiang Shipbuilding, which gained 1.67%, and Keppel, which added 1.36%.a India‚Äôs markets didn‚Äôt share the same momentum. The Nifty 50 Sensex index fell 0.26% by 9:30 a.m. IST (12 a.m. ET), showing how mixed sentiment still is across the region. Crypto saw a modest surge too. After a wild week, Bitcoin ticked up 0.21%, landing at $118,368.56 by 12:16 p.m. Singapore time (12:15 a.m. ET). The gains weren‚Äôt explosive, but they were enough to keep bullish traders engaged. KEY Difference Wire helps crypto brands break through and dominate headlines fast

HEADLINE: NFT Market Cap Skyrockets to $6.4 Billion‚ÄîIs the Bull Run Back?
SUMMARY: The post NFT Market Cap Skyrockets to $6.4 Billion‚ÄîIs the Bull Run Back? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The NFT market has made a dramatic comeback, with its total market capitalization surging past $6.4 billion‚Äîa staggering 23% increase in just 24 hours. This marks one of the strongest daily performances in over a year and reflects renewed investor interest amid a broader crypto market rally. As daily NFT trading volume also soared past $39 million, the signals of a potential bullish cycle are becoming increasingly difficult to ignore. From rising floor prices in blue-chip collections to renewed Bitcoin NFT activity, several factors have contributed to this explosive rise. Let‚Äôs examine the catalysts and what they mean for the future of NFTs. What Sparked the NFT Market Rally? The rally was triggered by a mix of macroeconomic momentum and market-specific developments. Most notably, Bitcoin price‚Äôs recent surge above $120,000 has brought positive sentiment back to digital assets. As a result, capital is once again flowing into NFTs, an asset class that had remained relatively subdued for much of the past year. The floor prices of key Ethereum-based collections witnessed notable growth. Moonbirds led the gains with a 31% jump, pushing its floor price to 1.84 ETH. CryptoPunks followed with a 14% rise to 46.7 ETH, while Azuki and BAYC also saw healthy single-digit gains. These collections, often considered blue chips of the NFT world, played a central role in pulling the market upward. Additionally, the NFT scene on Bitcoin has shown explosive growth. Ordinals and other Bitcoin-native NFT projects experienced over a 400% surge in weekly volumes. This cross-chain momentum has added a new layer of investor interest, proving that the NFT ecosystem is maturing beyond Ethereum. Market Data and Activity Highlights According to CoinGecko, the total NFT market cap climbed to $6.41 billion, with 24-hour trading volume jumping over 317%, reaching nearly $40 million. This isn‚Äôt just price appreciation‚Äîthere‚Äôs a substantial rise in trading activity, suggesting stronger liquidity and growing market participation. Ethereum still dominates the NFT space, but Bitcoin-based NFTs and emerging ecosystems like Solana and Polygon are showing promising growth. This diversity in NFT infrastructure highlights a shift toward a more robust and scalable market environment, one less dependent on a single blockchain. Can the Momentum Continue? This surge may be the beginning of a sustained uptrend, but it comes with caveats. For momentum to hold, the NFT market must maintain high trading volume and buyer engagement. With BTC and ETH both in strong positions and traditional investors showing renewed interest in crypto assets, the broader market sentiment appears favorable. What‚Äôs different this time is the combination of increased cross-chain activity and expanding utility. Brands like Nike, Starbucks, and Pudgy Penguins are building real-world integrations and digital experiences that give NFTs practical value, not just speculative appeal. If the trend continues, market analysts expect the NFT market cap could push toward the $7 billion mark in the coming quarter. A sustained rally could also rejuvenate mid-tier collections and bring fresh liquidity to lesser-known projects. Wrapping it Up! The NFT market has re-entered the spotlight with force. A 23% daily gain and a $6.4 billion valuation suggest renewed strength, backed by strong fundamentals and rising floor prices. While caution is always warranted, the current indicators hint at a promising chapter ahead for NFTs.

Ordinals and other Bitcoin-native NFT projects experienced over a 400% surge in weekly volumes. This cross-chain momentum has added a new layer of investor interest, proving that the NFT ecosystem is maturing beyond Ethereum. Market Data and Activity Highlights According to CoinGecko, the total NFT market cap climbed to $6.41 billion, with 24-hour trading volume jumping over 317%, reaching nearly $40 million. This isn‚Äôt just price appreciation‚Äîthere‚Äôs a substantial rise in trading activity, suggesting stronger liquidity and growing market participation. Ethereum still dominates the NFT space, but Bitcoin-based NFTs and emerging ecosystems like Solana and Polygon are showing promising growth. This diversity in NFT infrastructure highlights a shift toward a more robust and scalable market environment, one less dependent on a single blockchain. Can the Momentum Continue? This surge may be the beginning of a sustained uptrend, but it comes with caveats. For momentum to hold, the NFT market must maintain high trading volume and buyer engagement. With BTC and ETH both in strong positions and traditional investors showing renewed interest in crypto assets, the broader market sentiment appears favorable. What‚Äôs different this time is the combination of increased cross-chain activity and expanding utility. Brands like Nike, Starbucks, and Pudgy Penguins are building real-world integrations and digital experiences that give NFTs practical value, not just speculative appeal. If the trend continues, market analysts expect the NFT market cap could push toward the $7 billion mark in the coming quarter. A sustained rally could also rejuvenate mid-tier collections and bring fresh liquidity to lesser-known projects. Wrapping it Up! The NFT market has re-entered the spotlight with force. A 23% daily gain and a $6.4 billion valuation suggest renewed strength, backed by strong fundamentals and rising floor prices. While caution is always warranted, the current indicators hint at a promising chapter ahead for NFTs.

HEADLINE: US Marshals Unveil Real BTC Holdings
SUMMARY: A Freedom of Information Act request filed by journalist L0la‚ÄØL33tz revealed that as of March, the U.S. Marshals Service officially has custody of 28,988‚ÄØBTC ‚Äîvalued at about $3.4‚ÄØbillion ‚Äîsignificantly lower than public estimates of nearly 200,000‚ÄØBTC. Many third‚Äëparty trackers like Arkham Intelligence had previously assumed a much larger total based on on‚Äëchain observations. This discrepancy stems from a key difference: the Marshals manage forfeited BTC‚Äîassets legally awarded to the government‚Äîwhile other agencies like the FBI and IRS may hold seized BTC that haven‚Äôt been forfeited yet, meaning they‚Äôre not officially government property The revelation stirred controversy. Senator Cynthia Lummis warned that liquidating more than 80% of government crypto reserves could be a "strategic blunder" in the global Bitcoin race. Meanwhile, industry observers suggest that the reduced holdings may limit government influence on market dynamics. In response, analysts are calling for more transparency , improved coordination among federal crypto custodians, and clear records on custody arrangements‚Äîeven as some seized coins remain held with private custodians like Coinbase or Anchorage

HEADLINE: Dogecoin Price Prediction ‚Äì Will DOGE Price Surge to $0.42 or Drop to $0.20?
SUMMARY: The post Dogecoin Price Prediction ‚Äì Will DOGE Price Surge to $0.42 or Drop to $0.20? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Dogecoin has staged a powerful comeback, surging over 32% in the past seven days and climbing 8.57% in the last 24 hours alone, reaching $0.2727. DOGE has once again captured market attention, with its market cap zooming to $41.01 billion and daily volume rocketing past $6 billion. The rally comes amid a technical breakout, whale accumulation, and a significant capital injection by Bit Origin Ltd. However, not everything is bright, as the risk of $442 million worth of token unlocks and overleveraged positions may test the rally‚Äôs future. If DOGE is under your watchlist, this short-term Dogecoin price prediction is a must-read for you. Why is DOGE Price Going Up? The moonish DOGE price rally is being driven by the following bullish catalysts: Technical Breakout: The completion of a textbook cup and handle pattern has triggered a breakout above the crucial $0.25 resistance level. This has resulted in the liquidation of nearly $19.94 million in short positions, further fueling the rally. Altcoin Rotation: DOGE‚Äôs surge coincides with the breakout of the TOTAL2 chart, which tracks the total crypto market cap excluding Bitcoin, above an 8-year resistance.. Whale Accumulation: Wallets holding 100 million to 1 billion DOGE have added 1.08 billion DOGE in July alone. This includes a notable 48-hour spree that saw massive inflows. Institutional Backing: Bit Origin Ltd.‚Äôs $500 million fundraising round, aimed specifically at investing in Dogecoin, has added credibility to the meme token. Dogecoin Price Analysis As evident from the chart that I have shared, the breakout from the cup and handle formation suggests a measured target near $0.3299. Successively, Dogecoin could also have a further upside potential toward $0.4274 if momentum sustains. Talking about indicators, the Bollinger Bands are expanding rapidly, confirming rising volatility and buying pressure. RSI stands at 85.06, signaling extreme overbought conditions. However, caution is advised, as a $442 million token unlock scheduled this week may lead to short-term selling pressure. This could drag the price down to $0.20 if the support at $0.20 is broken. FAQs Why is Doge‚Äôs price up today? A cup-and-handle breakout, whale accumulation, and Bit Origin‚Äôs $500M fund have triggered the surge Should I buy Dogecoin now? It is worth noting that despite bullish momentum, high RSI, token unlocks, and leveraged longs pose short-term risks.

HEADLINE: Major US Economic Events This Week Could Shake the Crypto Market
SUMMARY: The post Major US Economic Events This Week Could Shake the Crypto Market appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News This week, the crypto market braces for key U.S. economic updates that could influence both Bitcoin and Ethereum prices. With Fed Chair Jerome Powell‚Äôs speech, housing data, and major S&P 500 earnings on deck, investors are on edge. The outcomes may dictate short-term trends in both traditional finance and digital assets. Fed Chair Powell‚Äôs Speech on July 22, 2025 Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell is set to speak on Tuesday, July 22, 2025, at a banking conference. His remarks are expected to shed light on the Fed‚Äôs stance on interest rate policy, especially following recent inflation increases. The Fed has held rates steady at 4.25%‚Äì4.50% since March. June inflation rose from 2.4% to 2.7%, marking the highest level since February. President Donald Trump has continued pushing for steep rate cuts , while Powell maintains a data-driven approach focused on inflation and labor trends. His comments could significantly influence crypto market sentiment. US Housing Market: Existing and New Home Sales On July 23, existing home sales data for June will be released. The figure had increased to 4.3 million in May but is now expected to decline back to 4 million, suggesting a cooling resale market. Meanwhile, on July 24, new home sales data will be published. The previous reading had dropped to 0.623 million in May, but expectations for June point to a recovery at 0.65 million. A rebound could reflect builder confidence and continued construction momentum, both of which signal the overall health of the economy. Also on July 24, the S&P Global US Manufacturing PMI will be released. The index rose to 52.9 in June from 52, signaling expansion in the sector. However, concerns are growing over inventory build-ups and tariff-related pressures that could lead to slower growth in July. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : White House Set to Launch First Major Crypto Policy Report On July 22 , S&P 500 Earnings to Drive Market Volatility This week, around 112 S&P 500 companies‚Äîroughly 22% of the index‚Äîwill release their Q2 2025 results. These include major names like Google, Tesla, IBM, Coca-Cola, General Motors, Verizon, and Intel. Investors will examine these earnings for signs of corporate strength, consumer behavior, and inflationary pressures. Strong results may drive rallies in both traditional and crypto markets, while weaker-than-expected outcomes could lead to pullbacks. HEADLINE: Not Even Bitcoin Is Safe: Kiyosaki Warns Of Massive Market Collapse
SUMMARY: Veteran investor Robert‚ÄØKiyosaki has sounded a stark warning for markets that have just seen Bitcoin hit a fresh all‚Äëtime high of $123,000. According to Kiyosaki, long‚Äërunning bubbles in the US economy are primed to burst, and Bitcoin could slide right along with stocks and bonds. The cryptocurrency is already off its peak, trading past the $118,000 mark after profit‚Äëtaking by long‚Äëterm holders. Related Reading: Crypto Crooks Take Over Stellar Blade‚Äôs X Account, Spread Fake Crypto Major Debt And Sticky Inflation Based on reports, the US national debt has climbed to over $36 trillion, a level few would have imagined a decade ago. At the same time, June‚Äôs Consumer Price Index shows inflation isn‚Äôt cooling as fast as hoped. Those figures have left many investors on edge. Kiyosaki, who has championed Bitcoin as a hedge against currency weakness, believes these pressures will trigger a broad market pullback. He warned that gold, silver and Bitcoin may see sharp corrections when the wider ‚Äúbubbles‚Äù finally burst. Still, he made it clear he views any drop as a chance to buy more. BUBBLES are about to start BUSTING. When bubbles bust odds are gold, silver, and Bitcoin will bust too. Good news. If prices of gold, silver, and Bitcoin crash‚Ä¶. I will be buying. Take care. ‚Äî Robert Kiyosaki (@theRealKiyosaki) July 21, 2025 Whales Move To Exchanges On‚Äëchain data tell a similar story of caution. According to Glassnode, the 7‚Äëday simple moving average of whale‚Äëto‚Äëexchange transfers is approaching 12,000 BTC‚Äîthe highest level seen in 2025 so far. That surge mirrors activity from November‚ÄØ24, 2024, when large holders began shifting coins onto trading platforms to lock in gains. Bitcoin has already climbed over 50% since its April lows, so some pullback was almost inevitable. Miners have also started moving coins, suggesting they too are taking profits. BTCUSD trading at $119,426 on the 24-hour chart: TradingView Firms Double Down On Bitcoin Institutional appetite remains strong, even amid talk of a crash. Twenty‚Äëone firms added roughly $810 million of Bitcoin to their balance sheets last week alone as part of their treasury plans. Spot Bitcoin ETFs are still drawing steady inflows, offering a regulated path for investors to gain exposure. Those continued purchases could soften the blow if a bigger sell‚Äëoff takes hold. Related Reading: Wall Street Goes Bitcoin Shopping: $810M Added To Corporate Reserves Market observers see a tug‚Äëof‚Äëwar playing out. On one side, big holders are cashing in after a historic rally. On the other, companies and funds are piling in, betting that any dip will be short‚Äëlived. Short‚Äëterm traders may try to ride the volatility. Long‚Äëterm backers, like Kiyosaki, are eyeing deeper discounts before they pull the trigger on new buys. The coming weeks could test Bitcoin‚Äôs resilience. If debt concerns and stubborn inflation dominate headlines, volatility may spike. Yet the ongoing institutional support and Kiyosaki‚Äôs buy‚Äëthe‚Äëdip stance hint that any slide could set the stage for a fresh rally. Featured image from Meta, chart from TradingView

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Strategy: Jetking Infotrain‚Äôs Bold Move for Future Growth
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Strategy: Jetking Infotrain‚Äôs Bold Move for Future Growth In a significant development that underscores the growing embrace of digital assets within traditional corporate finance, Indian IT firm Jetking Infotrain has made headlines with its decisive move to bolster its Bitcoin strategy . The company recently approved a substantial preferential equity issue, amounting to 115 million rupees (approximately $1.33 million), specifically earmarked to strengthen its financial approach centered around Bitcoin (BTC). This strategic allocation highlights a forward-thinking perspective from a long-standing IT player, signaling a potential shift in corporate treasury management across various sectors. Understanding Jetking‚Äôs Visionary Bitcoin Strategy Jetking Infotrain, a well-established name in the Indian IT and vocational training landscape, announced its commitment to a Bitcoin strategy through an official statement from its CFO, Siddarth Bharwani, on X. This move isn‚Äôt a sudden whim but a calculated financial pivot, adopted by the company in December 2024. The primary motivations behind this innovative approach are clear: to diversify the company‚Äôs asset holdings and to establish a robust hedge against inflationary pressures. The decision to raise equity specifically for this purpose demonstrates a strong conviction in Bitcoin‚Äôs role as a legitimate financial asset. Instead of relying solely on traditional fiat currencies or conventional investments, Jetking is channeling fresh capital directly into supporting its digital asset ambitions. This signals a deeper integration of Bitcoin into its core financial operations, moving beyond mere speculative interest to a foundational treasury strategy. Why Are Companies Embracing a Bitcoin Strategy? Jetking Infotrain is not alone in its exploration of a Bitcoin strategy . Over the past few years, a growing number of public and private companies globally have begun to incorporate Bitcoin into their balance sheets. But what drives this trend? Several compelling factors make Bitcoin an attractive, albeit unconventional, asset for corporate treasuries: Inflation Hedge: In an era of unprecedented quantitative easing and rising inflation concerns, Bitcoin‚Äôs fixed supply (capped at 21 million coins) offers a stark contrast to fiat currencies, which can be printed indefinitely. This scarcity makes it a potential store of value, preserving purchasing power over time. Diversification: Traditional investment portfolios often consist of stocks, bonds, and real estate. Bitcoin, with its low correlation to traditional markets, offers a unique diversification tool. Adding BTC can potentially reduce overall portfolio risk and enhance returns. Digital Gold Narrative: Often referred to as ‚Äòdigital gold,‚Äô Bitcoin shares characteristics with the precious metal, serving as a safe-haven asset during economic uncertainty. Its decentralized nature and resistance to censorship further bolster this appeal. Potential for Appreciation: Despite its volatility, Bitcoin has demonstrated significant long-term growth potential. Companies holding Bitcoin are positioning themselves to benefit from its continued adoption and potential price appreciation as the digital economy evolves. Innovation and Future-Proofing: Embracing Bitcoin can signal a company‚Äôs commitment to innovation and its readiness to adapt to the evolving digital financial landscape. This can enhance brand perception and attract forward-thinking investors and talent. text: Bitcoin Strategy: Jetking Infotrain‚Äôs Bold Move for Future Growth. BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Strategy: Jetking Infotrain‚Äôs Bold Move for Future Growth In a significant development that underscores the growing embrace of digital assets within traditional corporate finance, Indian IT firm Jetking Infotrain has made headlines with its decisive move to bolster its Bitcoin strategy . The company recently approved a substantial preferential equity issue, amounting to 115 million rupees (approximately $1.33 million), specifically earmarked to strengthen its financial approach centered around Bitcoin (BTC). This strategic allocation highlights a forward-thinking perspective from a long-standing IT player, signaling a potential shift in corporate treasury management across various sectors. Understanding Jetking‚Äôs Visionary Bitcoin Strategy Jetking Infotrain, a well-established name in the Indian IT and vocational training landscape, announced its commitment to a Bitcoin strategy through an official statement from its CFO, Siddarth Bharwani, on X. This move isn‚Äôt a sudden whim but a calculated financial pivot, adopted by the company in December 2024. The primary motivations behind this innovative approach are clear: to diversify the company‚Äôs asset holdings and to establish a robust hedge against inflationary pressures. The decision to raise equity specifically for this purpose demonstrates a strong conviction in Bitcoin‚Äôs role as a legitimate financial asset. Instead of relying solely on traditional fiat currencies or conventional investments, Jetking is channeling fresh capital directly into supporting its digital asset ambitions. This signals a deeper integration of Bitcoin into its core financial operations, moving beyond mere speculative interest to a foundational treasury strategy. Why Are Companies Embracing a Bitcoin Strategy? Jetking Infotrain is not alone in its exploration of a Bitcoin strategy . Over the past few years, a growing number of public and private companies globally have begun to incorporate Bitcoin into their balance sheets. But what drives this trend? Several compelling factors make Bitcoin an attractive, albeit unconventional, asset for corporate treasuries: Inflation Hedge: In an era of unprecedented quantitative easing and rising inflation concerns, Bitcoin‚Äôs fixed supply (capped at 21 million coins) offers a stark contrast to fiat currencies, which can be printed indefinitely. This scarcity makes it a potential store of value, preserving purchasing power over time. Diversification: Traditional investment portfolios often consist of stocks, bonds, and real estate. Bitcoin, with its low correlation to traditional markets, offers a unique diversification tool. Adding BTC can potentially reduce overall portfolio risk and enhance returns. Digital Gold Narrative: Often referred to as ‚Äòdigital gold,‚Äô Bitcoin shares characteristics with the precious metal, serving as a safe-haven asset during economic uncertainty. Its decentralized nature and resistance to censorship further bolster this appeal. Potential for Appreciation: Despite its volatility, Bitcoin has demonstrated significant long-term growth potential. Companies holding Bitcoin are positioning themselves to benefit from its continued adoption and potential price appreciation as the digital economy evolves. Innovation and Future-Proofing: Embracing Bitcoin can signal a company‚Äôs commitment to innovation and its readiness to adapt to the evolving digital financial landscape. This can enhance brand perception and attract forward-thinking investors and talent. The Benefits of a Corporate Bitcoin Strategy For a company like Jetking Infotrain, adopting a clear Bitcoin strategy can unlock several strategic advantages beyond just financial gains: Benefit Category Description Financial Resilience By holding a portion of assets in Bitcoin, companies aim to protect against fiat currency devaluation and provide a hedge against economic instability, bolstering their long-term financial health. Growth Opportunities Exposure to a high-growth asset class offers the potential for significant capital appreciation, which can contribute substantially to a company‚Äôs balance sheet and shareholder value over time. Market Leadership Being an early or prominent adopter of digital assets positions a company as an innovator, attracting new investors, customers, and talent who are aligned with the future of finance and technology. Strategic Diversification Reducing reliance on traditional assets helps spread risk and improve portfolio stability, especially during periods when conventional markets are under pressure. Navigating the Challenges of a Bitcoin Strategy While the allure of Bitcoin is strong, a corporate Bitcoin strategy is not without its complexities and risks. Companies venturing into this space must be prepared for: Price Volatility: Bitcoin is notorious for its rapid price swings. While this offers potential for significant gains, it also carries the risk of substantial losses, which can impact a company‚Äôs reported earning

HEADLINE: Altcoins Heat Up as Bitcoin Cools, But Is the Rally Ending Soon?
SUMMARY: The post Altcoins Heat Up as Bitcoin Cools, But Is the Rally Ending Soon? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Bitcoin is holding steady around $119,366 today with little movement, but altcoins have been stealing the show. Ethereum, XRP, Solana, Dogecoin, and Cardano are all seeing solid gains between 3‚Äì8%. Altcoin Season Index At 51 In just a few days, the Altcoin Season Index has risen from 39 to 51. Although a full-blown altcoin season is still far away ( above 75), the market is showing early signs of strength. ETH jumped to $3,793, its highest since early 2022. DOGE has stolen the show with a 9% surge, and is up 32% on the week. The CMC Altcoin Index is currently at 56. Coinglass notes that the Altcoin Season Index is climbing quickly, but so far, only a few altcoins are showing strong gains. If Ethereum breaks above $4,000, then it could trigger a major surge across the altcoin market. Very interested to see how the next week is going to be for #Altcoins . Given that we''re slightly extended to the upside (short term) in terms of volatility, I would guess we''re getting a significant short and violent correction and continue the uptrend. These six months are‚Ä¶ ‚Äî Micha√´l van de Poppe (@CryptoMichNL) July 20, 2025 According to analyst Michael Van De Poppe, the current price action suggests the market may be slightly overextended in the short term, which could lead to a swift and sharp correction. However, this would likely be a healthy pullback within a broader bullish trend. Overall, the next six months will be massively bullish for altcoins. Meanwhile, Bitcoin‚Äôs dominance has dropped sharply, down 5.8% in a week to just under 61%, its lowest level since March. This shift shows that traders are moving away from BTC and into altcoins. Altcoins, with ETH at the forefront, have taken the lead in the latest market rally. TOTAL2 Nears Major Breakout Analyst Moustache is pointing out that the TOTAL2 chart (which tracks the altcoin market cap) is about to break above a trendline that‚Äôs held for 8 years. If the 2-week candle closes above this line, it could signal the start of a strong altcoin bull run. Altcoin Rally Could End by Late August? However, expert Benjamin Cowen says that altcoins may be losing steam, with ALT/ETH pairs down 40% since April. While some altcoins are up against BTC, it‚Äôs mostly due to Ethereum‚Äôs strength, not broad market momentum. He warns the altcoin rally could peak by late August, with Bitcoin dominance likely rising again in September or October. For now, ETH remains the stronger performer.

HEADLINE: Digital Asset Inflows: Unprecedented $4.39 Billion Surge Ignites Market Optimism
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Digital Asset Inflows: Unprecedented $4.39 Billion Surge Ignites Market Optimism The cryptocurrency market is buzzing with excitement as the latest report from CoinShares reveals an astonishing surge in digital asset inflows . This isn‚Äôt just a slight uptick; we‚Äôre talking about a monumental, record-breaking influx of capital that signals a growing confidence among investors, both retail and institutional. For anyone tracking the pulse of digital finance, this news confirms a powerful shift, painting a vibrant picture of an ecosystem attracting significant investment and solidifying its place in the global financial landscape. What‚Äôs Driving This Monumental Surge in Digital Asset Inflows? According to CoinShares‚Äô latest Digital Asset Fund Flows Weekly Report, the past week alone witnessed a staggering $4.39 billion in weekly digital asset inflows . This pushes the year-to-date inflows to an impressive $27 billion and has propelled the total assets under management (AUM) to an all-time high of $220 billion. These figures aren‚Äôt just numbers; they represent a significant validation of the digital asset space as a legitimate and increasingly attractive investment avenue. Let‚Äôs break down where this capital is flowing: Ethereum (ETH) : Led the charge with a record $2.12 billion in inflows, nearly doubling its previous record. This remarkable performance suggests a renewed investor interest in Ethereum‚Äôs ecosystem, possibly fueled by anticipation around potential spot Ethereum Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) and its ongoing advancements. Bitcoin (BTC) : Not far behind, Bitcoin secured $2.2 billion in inflows. While slightly less than Ethereum this particular week, Bitcoin‚Äôs consistent strong performance highlights its enduring status as the premier digital store of value and the continued impact of spot Bitcoin ETFs. Other Notable Contributors : XRP: $36 million Solana (SOL): $39 million Sui: $9.3 million The sheer volume of these digital asset inflows , especially into Ethereum, is a testament to the market‚Äôs evolving dynamics. Ethereum‚Äôs 2025 inflows have already surpassed its total for 2024, reaching $6.2 billion, indicating a long-term bullish outlook for the smart contract platform. The Bitcoin and Ethereum Phenomenon: Leading the Digital Asset Inflows Charge While the overall market celebrates, Bitcoin and Ethereum stand out as the primary beneficiaries of these massive digital asset inflows . Bitcoin, often seen as the gateway for institutional capital, continues to attract significant investment, largely thanks to the success and accessibility offered by spot Bitcoin ETFs in various jurisdictions. These regulated investment vehicles have demystified crypto investing for many traditional financial players, leading to a steady stream of new capital. Ethereum‚Äôs recent surge in digital asset inflows , however, is particularly noteworthy. Its record-breaking weekly performance underscores growing confidence in its fundamental utility and future potential. The network‚Äôs robust ecosystem, encompassing decentralized finance (DeFi), NFTs, and a vast developer community, makes it an attractive proposition for investors looking beyond just a store of value. The ongoing discussions and potential approval of spot Ethereum ETFs are undoubtedly playing a crucial role in drawing this unprecedented level of interest and capital into ETH-based products. The combined strength of Bitcoin and Ethereum‚Äôs performance in attracting these substantial digital asset inflows solidifies their position as the twin pillars of the cryptocurrency market. Their ability to draw such significant capital often acts as a barometer for broader market sentiment and institutional appetite for digital assets. Beyond the Giants: How Are Altcoins Contributing to Digital Asset Inflows? While Bitcoin and Ethereum dominate the headlines, the latest CoinShares report also highlights healthy contributions from other digital assets, indicating a diversification trend within the digital asset inflows landscape. The inclusion of XRP, Solana, and Sui in the top performers list suggests that investors are increasingly exploring opportunities beyond the top two cryptocurrencies. XRP‚Äôs $36 million in inflows could be attributed to ongoing legal clarity and its utility in cross-border payments. The asset continues to maintain a dedicated investor base that believes in its long-term potential for institutional adoption. Solana (SOL) , with $39 million in inflows, showcases the continued interest in high-performance blockchain networks. Solana‚Äôs rapid transaction speeds, low fees, and growing decentralized application (dApp) ecosystem make it an appealing choice for investors seeking exposure to next-generation blockchain technology. Its vibrant developer community and expanding use cases contribute significantly to its attractiveness for capital deployment. Even newer players like Sui , securing $9.3 million, demonstrate that investors are actively se

HEADLINE: CryptoCapo‚Äôs Crypto Prediction: Urgent Warning and a Massive Opportunity Awaits
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld CryptoCapo‚Äôs Crypto Prediction: Urgent Warning and a Massive Opportunity Awaits Are you feeling the market jitters? In the ever-unpredictable world of cryptocurrencies, a prominent voice has just issued a stark warning that could reshape your investment strategy. Get ready to dive deep into CryptoCapo‚Äôs Crypto Prediction , a forecast that suggests a significant downturn is on the horizon, yet paradoxically, it also points to an unparalleled opportunity for those with patience and foresight. Who is CryptoCapo and What Drives His Crypto Prediction? For those immersed in the digital asset space, the name CryptoCapo resonates with significant influence. With a substantial following of nearly a million (specifically, about 973,000 followers on X, formerly Twitter), CryptoCapo has established himself as a prominent cryptocurrency analyst whose market insights often capture the attention of investors worldwide. His commentary, frequently shared on platforms like Telegram, provides a real-time pulse on his evolving market outlook. His reputation is built on a track record of identifying key market movements, though like all predictions in volatile markets, they come with inherent risks. What makes CryptoCapo‚Äôs Crypto Prediction particularly noteworthy is his consistent bearish stance, even amidst recent market rallies. While many might be tempted by a strong bounce, CryptoCapo urges caution, emphasizing that such movements can often be deceptive in a broader downtrend. He views current market strength as temporary, a mere prelude to a more significant correction. The Core of CryptoCapo‚Äôs Crypto Prediction: A Looming Dip and a Grand Comeback CryptoCapo‚Äôs latest analysis is a two-part narrative: a near-term challenge followed by a long-term reward. He remains steadfastly bearish despite recent market enthusiasm, predicting a ‚Äúsharp decline‚Äù in the cryptocurrency market in the immediate future. This isn‚Äôt just a minor correction; he anticipates a substantial drop that could test the resolve of many investors. However, it‚Äôs the second part of his CryptoCapo‚Äôs Crypto Prediction that offers a glimmer of hope, or rather, a blazing beacon for strategic investors. Following this anticipated sharp decline, he foresees a ‚Äúmajor recovery‚Äù unfolding around October or November 2025. This specific timeframe is crucial, as CryptoCapo labels it a period for ‚Äúlife-changing gains.‚Äù To put this into perspective, consider the following: Immediate Outlook: Bearish, with a predicted sharp decline. This suggests that current price levels might not be sustainable and a significant pullback is imminent. Mid-Term Strategy: Patience is key. CryptoCapo advises against succumbing to FOMO (Fear Of Missing Out) during current bounces, as he believes better entry points are on the horizon. Long-Term Opportunity: A major recovery anticipated in October or November 2025. This period is highlighted as a prime window for accumulating assets that could yield substantial returns. This kind of foresight, while speculative, highlights the importance of having a long-term investment horizon in crypto. It‚Äôs not just about reacting to daily price swings but understanding the broader market cycles. Navigating the Emotional Rollercoaster: Why Patience is Paramount in CryptoCapo‚Äôs Crypto Prediction The cryptocurrency market is notorious for its extreme volatility, which often triggers emotional responses from investors. FOMO, or the Fear Of Missing Out, is a powerful psychological trap that leads many to buy assets at their peak, only to see their value plummet. Conversely, FUD (Fear, Uncertainty, and Doubt) can cause investors to panic sell at the bottom, missing out on subsequent recoveries. CryptoCapo‚Äôs warning against FOMO is a direct call to resist these emotional impulses. He explicitly states that investors ‚Äúshould not fear missing out, as better opportunities lie ahead.‚Äù This advice is crucial because it encourages a disciplined approach to investing. Instead of chasing pumps, CryptoCapo‚Äôs perspective suggests that waiting for a significant dip could provide a more favorable entry point, aligning with the ‚Äúbuy the dip‚Äù philosophy that has historically rewarded patient investors in cyclical markets. Table: Short-Term Risk vs. Long-Term Potential based on CryptoCapo‚Äôs Crypto Prediction Factor Short-Term Outlook (Now ‚Äì Early 2025) Long-Term Outlook (Late 2025 Onwards) Market Sentiment Potential for FUD and panic selling Optimism, recovery, and growth Price Action Predicted sharp decline, increased volatility Major recovery, potential for ‚Äúlife-changing gains‚Äù Investor Strategy Caution, patience, avoid FOMO, prepare for accumulation Strategic accumulation, holding for long-term growth Risk Level Higher immediate downside risk Reduced entry risk post-dip, higher upside potential This table illustrates the dichotomy of CryptoCapo‚Äôs Crypto Prediction , highlighting the need for a shift in mindset from short-term gains to long-term strategic positi

HEADLINE: Korean Crypto Trends: Unveiling the Astonishing Dominance of XRP in the K-Community
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Korean Crypto Trends: Unveiling the Astonishing Dominance of XRP in the K-Community The cryptocurrency market is a dynamic beast, constantly shifting with global sentiment, technological advancements, and regional interests. Nowhere is this more evident than in the vibrant South Korean crypto community, often dubbed the ‚ÄúK-Community.‚Äù Known for its enthusiastic adoption and rapid trend shifts, understanding the pulse of this market can offer invaluable insights into broader crypto movements. This past week, from July 11 to 17, the K-Community on Bitcoin World provided a fascinating snapshot of the most compelling Korean crypto trends , revealing which tokens captured the most attention and discussion. Are you ready to dive deep into the digital assets that dominated the minds and conversations of Korean investors? What Were the Top Korean Crypto Trends in Search? When investors are curious, they search. The volume of searches often reflects potential interest, research, or a growing awareness of a particular asset. Bitcoin World‚Äôs data from the K-Community highlights the tokens that were most actively looked up during the specified week. The results present an intriguing mix of established giants and promising newcomers, painting a clear picture of the current Korean crypto trends in terms of user curiosity. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of the top 10 tokens that commanded the most searches: Token Search Count XRP 90,426 ETH 25,312 SOL 19,299 BTC 18,717 ONDO 14,511 SEI 13,589 PENGU 9,605 XLM 9,285 ADA 9,042 HBAR 6,631 XRP‚Äôs Phenomenal Lead: Leading the pack by a significant margin was XRP, with over 90,000 searches. This massive interest likely stems from its ongoing legal developments and its established role in cross-border payments. The K-Community has historically shown strong affinity for XRP, and any news, positive or negative, tends to amplify search volume. This clearly demonstrates a major element of Korean crypto trends . The Usual Suspects: Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), and Bitcoin (BTC) maintained strong positions, reflecting their foundational status in the crypto ecosystem. ETH and SOL continue to be central to decentralized finance (DeFi) and NFTs, while Bitcoin remains the benchmark digital asset. Their consistent presence indicates a healthy, underlying interest in core blockchain technologies. Emerging Altcoins Catching Eyes: ONDO, SEI, and PENGU made notable appearances in the top searched list. ONDO Finance, focusing on tokenized real-world assets (RWAs), is gaining traction as investors look for new narratives. SEI, a Layer 1 blockchain optimized for trading, appeals to the fast-paced nature of the Korean market. PENGU, likely a meme coin or a newer project, suggests the K-Community‚Äôs appetite for novel, high-risk/high-reward assets. These newer tokens often represent the cutting edge of Korean crypto trends , indicating where speculative interest might be heading. Which Tokens Sparked the Most Discussion in Korean Crypto Trends? Beyond mere curiosity, ‚Äúmentions‚Äù signify active discussion, community engagement, and often, a higher level of conviction or debate. This metric reveals which tokens were truly at the forefront of conversations within the K-Community on Bitcoin World during the same period. Understanding these discussion points is crucial for grasping the full scope of Korean crypto trends . Here are the top 10 tokens that were most frequently mentioned: Token Mention Count BTC 2,280 ETH 1,541 XRP 734 SOL 609 TRUMP 253 XLM 229 PENGU 212 ADA 186 SEI 150 DOGE 143 Bitcoin and Ethereum Dominate Discussions: Unlike the search list, Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) took the top two spots for mentions. This is expected, as these are the pillars of the crypto market, constantly generating news, price movements, and fundamental discussions. They are the bedrock of any serious conversation about Korean crypto trends and the broader market. XRP‚Äôs Continued Presence: XRP remained strong in mentions, albeit at a lower rank than in searches. This suggests that while there‚Äôs immense curiosity, the active discussion might be more centered around its established status rather than new developments, or perhaps the intensity of debate has shifted. The Rise of Meme Coins and Political Tokens: The appearance of TRUMP and DOGE is particularly noteworthy. TRUMP, likely a political meme coin, indicates the K-Community‚Äôs engagement with global narratives, even those outside traditional crypto use cases. DOGE, a long-standing meme coin, continues to hold a place in discussions, often driven by celebrity endorsements or viral social media moments. These demonstrate the more speculative and culturally influenced aspects of Korean crypto trends . Emerging and Established Altcoins: SOL, XLM, PENGU, ADA, and SEI also feature in the mentioned list, reinforcing their relevance. XLM (Stellar) often moves in tandem with XRP due to similar use cases in payments, while ADA (Cardano) continues to have a dedicate

HEADLINE: Altcoin Season: Explosive Optimism as 64.3% of Korean Crypto Investors Expect 2024 Surge
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Altcoin Season: Explosive Optimism as 64.3% of Korean Crypto Investors Expect 2024 Surge Are you feeling the buzz in the crypto air? For many, the whispers of an impending altcoin season are growing louder, especially among a significant portion of Korean crypto investors. This isn‚Äôt just wishful thinking; recent survey data sheds light on a powerful wave of optimism sweeping through one of the world‚Äôs most dynamic crypto markets, suggesting that the stage might be set for significant moves beyond Bitcoin. What‚Äôs Driving the Bitcoin Buzz Among Korean Investors? The latest survey, conducted by Bitcoin World and Cratos between June 15 and 18, provides a fascinating snapshot of weekly trends among South Korean cryptocurrency investors. With Bitcoin (BTC) recently hitting new all-time highs, it‚Äôs no surprise that confidence is building. The survey reveals a steady increase in bullish sentiment towards BTC‚Äôs immediate future, signaling a strong foundation for the broader market, which often precedes an altcoin season . BTC Price Expectation This Week (June 15-18) Last Week Increase or Significantly Jump 46.0% 45.0% Stable Market 29.7% 28.9% Decline or Sharp Drop 24.3% 26.1% Unpacking the Overall Market Sentiment: Is Optimism Pervasive for Altcoin Season? Beyond just Bitcoin‚Äôs trajectory, the survey delved into the broader market sentiment among South Korean investors. The findings paint a picture of cautious optimism, a common characteristic before a potential altcoin season truly takes hold. This general upbeat mood suggests that investors are not just focused on Bitcoin but are also looking at the potential for gains across the wider cryptocurrency ecosystem. Optimistic or Extremely Optimistic: 56.4% Neutral: 24.9% Fear or Extreme Fear: 18.7% The majority expressing optimism, coupled with a relatively low percentage feeling fear, indicates a healthy market psychology that could support a robust altcoin season . The Anticipation: Will We See an Altcoin Season This Year? The most compelling revelation from the survey points directly to the fervent expectation of an altcoin season . A remarkable 64.3% of respondents believe that an altcoin season will indeed arrive this year. This strong conviction contrasts with the 35.7% who do not foresee it happening in 2025 (or this year, aligning with the general sentiment). The survey‚Äôs focus on ‚Äòthis year‚Äô for altcoin season expectation is crucial, suggesting a belief in near-term gains for alternative cryptocurrencies. What exactly is an altcoin season ? It‚Äôs a period when alternative cryptocurrencies (altcoins) significantly outperform Bitcoin, often leading to substantial gains across the broader crypto market. This typically occurs after Bitcoin has made strong moves, stabilizing at a new price level, allowing capital to flow into smaller, more volatile assets. The current market conditions, with BTC‚Äôs strong performance, align well with historical precedents for an impending altcoin season . What Drives the Korean Confidence in an Altcoin Season? Korean investors are known for their active participation and keen eye on market trends. Their strong expectation for an altcoin season isn‚Äôt without reason. Several factors might be contributing to this bullish outlook: Bitcoin‚Äôs Stability and Dominance: After BTC‚Äôs strong rally and establishment of new all-time highs, many believe that capital will naturally rotate into altcoins. This ‚Äòtrickle-down‚Äô effect is a classic pattern observed in previous bull cycles, where Bitcoin leads the charge, and then altcoins follow. Innovation and Development: Many altcoins represent groundbreaking technologies in areas like Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), Layer 2 solutions, and GameFi. As these ecosystems mature and gain adoption, their underlying tokens become more attractive. The continuous innovation in the altcoin space fuels optimism for their future performance. Increased Retail Participation: A general uptick in market optimism, fueled by Bitcoin‚Äôs performance, often brings new retail investors into the market, many of whom are drawn to the higher potential (and risk) of altcoins. This influx of new capital can significantly boost altcoin prices during an altcoin season . Macroeconomic Factors: Global economic conditions, inflation concerns, and interest rate policies can also indirectly influence investor appetite for riskier assets like altcoins, as investors seek alternative stores of value or growth opportunities. Navigating the Potential Altcoin Season: Actionable Insights for Investors If an altcoin season is indeed on the horizon, how can investors best prepare and participate responsibly? Here are some actionable insights to consider: Research is Key: Don‚Äôt jump into altcoins blindly. Understand the project‚Äôs fundamentals, its team, technology, use case, and tokenomics. Look for projects with strong communities and active development. Thorough research is your best defense against vol
TAGS: Crypto News|altcoin season|BITCOIN|cryptocurrency survey|Korean crypto investors|Market Sentiment.

HEADLINE: Rich Dad Poor Dad Author Warns of Market Bubble, Says Bitcoin Could ‚ÄòBust‚Äô Soon
SUMMARY: Robert Kiyosaki has warned users of an imminent Bitcoin market collapse, calling it ‚Äúgood news.‚Äù He said that the current bubble is about to start busting. ‚ÄúWhen bubbles bust odds are gold, silver, and Bitcoin will bust too,‚Äù he wrote on X. BUBBLES are about to start BUSTING. When bubbles bust odds are gold, silver, and Bitcoin will bust too. Good news. If prices of gold, silver, and Bitcoin crash‚Ä¶. I will be buying. Take care. ‚Äî Robert Kiyosaki (@theRealKiyosaki) July 21, 2025 The renowned investor and author of Rich Dad Poor Dad believes that Bitcoin‚Äôs crash would be a major signal to buy for the long-term. Kiyosaki disclosed that he has plans to buy Bitcoin and other precious metals, gold and silver, during their dip. BTC price has witnessed a slight pullback from its last week‚Äôs all-time high of $123,000 and is currently trading at $119,370 at the time of writing. He celebrated Bitcoin‚Äôs all-time high on July 14, calling it a great news for those who already hold Bitcoin. Kiyosaki‚Äôs Consistent Bearish Predictions Robert Kiyosaki has had a history of predicting stock and crypto market crashes. Last month, he warned of a historic market crash , predicting that billions of investors would flee traditional markets and rush to Bitcoin. In March, he cautioned investors that ‚Äúthe everything bubble is bursting,‚Äù forecasting a downward trend that would be the biggest in history. He said that the bust would be bigger than the 1929 market crash, which led to the Great Depression. Despite his warning, Bitcoin only experienced a small price dip, hovering around the $80,000 mark at the time. Ever since, the largest crypto has soared above $100,000, breaking $123,000 on July 14. As reported earlier , the author believes that Bitcoin would climb to $1 million by 2035. He called Bitcoin the ‚Äúeasiest way to get rich,‚Äù urging that even small-scale ownership, like 0.01 BTC, could change lives. Bitcoin Miners, Whales Increase Exchange Deposits ‚Äì What‚Äôs Going On? On July 15, Bitcoin exchange inflows surged to 81,000 BTC, after the crypto reached an all-time high. This marks the largest daily figure since February. The increase was driven by whales and miners, where miner outflows hit 16,000 BTC. According to CryptoQuant, there was a drop in miner wallet balances, from 68,000 BTC to 65,000 BTC, since June 26. The drop indicated that miners used last week‚Äôs rally to realise profits. The post Rich Dad Poor Dad Author Warns of Market Bubble, Says Bitcoin Could ‚ÄòBust‚Äô Soon appeared first on Cryptonews .

HEADLINE: XRP Rockets 277% vs BTC in a Year as Ripple CEO Applauds GENIUS Act Win
SUMMARY: XRP Emerges as the Victor In the 12 months through, XRP has surged approximately 277‚ÄØ% against Bitcoin, a striking leap compared to BTC‚Äôs solid yet sober 88‚ÄØ% gain. Calling out this development, market analyst Kyle Chasse pointed out , ‚Äú Ripple is about to change everything. XRP has outperformed Bitcoin by triple digits ‚Ä¶ without a US ETF, treasury adoption, or native DeFi yield.‚Äù Interestingly, while BTC rode a wave of institutional adoption backed by exchange-traded funds (ETFs) and corporate treasury allocations, XRP delivered triple‚Äëdigit gains without a U.S. spot ETF, DeFi protocols, or major treasury accumulation. Furthermore, the XRP/BTC ratio climbed from roughly 0.00000902 to about 0.0000303, signaling XRP‚Äôs dominance in relative performance. In other words, every XRP held meant significantly more Bitcoin-year growth, a dramatic shift in value perception. So, why has XRP elbowed Bitcoin in the past year despite the latter holding significant advantages? Well, intensified whale activity and macro-regulatory tailwinds have favored the 3rd-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization. For instance, whales holding over 1 million XRP bought roughly 100 million coins in days while those with over 100 million amassed about 1.45‚ÄØbillion XRP. Combined with institutional inflows, such as Teucrium‚Äôs XXRP ETF gathering over $248‚ÄØmillion and $235‚ÄØmillion daily futures volumes, this indicates a deep, committed investment base. Furthermore, the U.S. political climate has bolstered XRP‚Äôs narrative. A new Trump-era strategy includes a proposed federal ‚Äúdigital asset stockpile‚Äù with XRP explicitly named alongside Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, and Cardano. Therefore, XRP‚Äôs 277‚ÄØ% outperformance of BTC reflects a convergence of forces, such as technical breakouts, rising institutional demand, regulatory momentum, and ecosystem growth. With spot‚ÄëETF approvals imminent, on‚Äëchain strength peaking, and macroeconomic backdrop improving, XRP may be entering a sustained altcoin bull phase, distinguishing it from Bitcoin‚Äôs evolving narrative. Ripple CEO Hails GENIUS Act Win Ripple CEO Garlinghouse took to X, formerly Twitter, to share photos from a historic moment where President Donald Trump signed the GENIUS Act into law, calling it a landmark win for crypto and the XRP community. Garlinghouse shared White House photos as the Ripple team witnessed President Trump sign the newly approved GENIUS Act. Calling it a historic moment for crypto, the Ripple CEO praised the law for delivering clear, pro-innovation regulation for the $250B stablecoin market, signaling a major shift from the nation‚Äôs traditionally cautious crypto approach. What the Passage of the GENIUS‚ÄØAct Means for XRP While the primary focus of the GENIUS Act is on stablecoins, industry experts see ripple effectsfor various cryptocurrencies, such as XRP. For instance, the immediate market response for XRP was strong following its passage. XRP soared to the $3.50 level with this rally reflecting renewed confidence in crypto regulation since the GENIUS Act provides the much‚Äêneeded clarity and signals a pro‚Äêcrypto U.S. stance. XRP‚Äôs parabolic structure continues to play out with the psychological price of $4.50 being in the picture. Additionally, the law paves the regulatory path for stablecoins like Ripple‚Äôs RLUSD. This new law mandates full reserve backing, audited reserves, and issuer licensing fully aligning with RLUSD‚Äôs design. Ripple has already applied for a national trust charter, pursued a Federal Reserve master account, and partnered with BNY Mellon for reserve custody. Analysts note that RLUSD can gain a first-mover advantage in a regulated stablecoin market. XRP, in this framework, benefits as the frictionless liquidity and settlement tool for RLUSD transactions. Conclusion The GENIUS Act doesn‚Äôt directly regulate XRP, but it clears the way for Ripple‚Äôs RLUSD stablecoin. By aligning regulatory infrastructure, reinforcing XRP''s bridge utility, and reducing SEC influence, the bill strengthens XRP‚Äôs role in regulated finance, explaining why Garlinghouse applauds the GENIUS Act passage. Meanwhile, XRP‚Äôs 277% gain vs BTC over the past year signals a radical shift because what began as speculative momentum is evolving into recognition of institutional adoption, on-chain utility, and regulatory legitimacy. With ETF entry points, whale accumulation, and bullish technical patterns converging, XRP is increasingly being perceived not just as an altcoin, but as a credible contender in the digital-asset space.
