HEADLINE: Best crypto for 2025? MUTM could deliver 1000% growth shortly
SUMMARY: The next big winner in crypto might not come from a familiar name like BTC or ETH. Instead, eyes are turning toward a bold new player in the DeFi space‚Äî Mutuum Finance (MUTM) . Combining real-world use cases, stablecoin innovation, and a dual lending engine, MUTM is entering the final stages of its presale phase 5 at just $0.03, with over $12.7 million already raised. With more than 85% of tokens sold to 13,750+ holders, this final discounted phase is ending fast. The price is set to rise to $0.035 next, marking the last chance to enter before a wave of post-listing momentum. The total token supply is capped at 4 billion, with each phase of the presale structured to reward early adoption. Momentum is growing rapidly, and analysts now consider this token one of the strongest breakout candidates for 2025. While most tokens rely solely on speculation, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is building a foundation around sustainable yield, secure lending, and protocol-driven value flows. Stablecoin-driven lending meets real yield utility Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is not following the usual playbook. The platform is constructing a decentralized borrowing system powered by a native stablecoin that only mints when overcollateralized loans are initiated. That means users will be able to lock bluechip crypto like ETH or BTC as collateral and mint stablecoins without selling their assets. Once loans are repaid‚Äîor liquidated if undercollateralized‚Äîthe stablecoins are automatically burned. This system ensures the token remains tightly pegged to $1 while offering liquidity to holders without sacrificing long-term positions or triggering tax events. The peg will be maintained not only through strict overcollateralization and burning logic but also by dynamic interest rates set via protocol governance. When the stablecoin trades above $1, borrowing interest will drop to encourage supply. When it trades below $1, interest will increase to contract supply. This elegant balancing mechanism, combined with arbitrage opportunities, forms a sturdy foundation for the ecosystem. In addition, depositors receive mtTokens, which represent their share in lending pools and accrue interest. These mtTokens can be staked into dedicated smart contracts to earn rewards in MUTM tokens that will be bought back from the open market. This buyback system turns the protocol into a self-reinforcing flywheel, where token demand is fueled directly by platform revenue, adding another layer of yield for long-term holders. Flexible lending models for all investor types Mutuum Finance (MUTM) will support both P2C and P2P lending models, giving users a range of tools to suit their needs. The P2C model will be ideal for passive investors seeking predictable returns. A lender supplying 1,000 AVAX at a 70% loan-to-value ratio will be able to earn an 8% APY, accumulating 80 AVAX annually in interest. Smart contracts will manage the loan matching and execution, with mtTokens issued as proof of deposit. In contrast, the P2P system will enable direct agreements between lenders and borrowers, focusing on high-risk or speculative tokens. For instance, a user holding $6,000 worth of FLOKI will be able to access a $2,400 USDT loan with 30-day repayment terms, depending on lender preferences. This will unlock liquidity opportunities for holders of volatile meme or micro-cap coins‚Äîassets that are often ignored by traditional DeFi lenders. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is also integrating Layer 2 blockchain architecture to eliminate congestion and reduce transaction costs. Users will experience fast settlement speeds and near-zero gas fees, making daily lending and borrowing practical and cost-effective. The roadmap is well-structured and includes four defined phases: the presale, smart contract development, beta launch, and full mainnet rollout. Each stage is being supported by institutional-grade security measures. The protocol has undergone a full audit by CertiK, scoring 95 in Token Scan and 77.5 on the Skynet system. Alongside this, a $50,000 USDT Bug Bounty is active to encourage external reviews, while a $100,000 token giveaway rewards community engagement. One leading crypto analyst‚Äîknown for accurately predicting Solana‚Äôs 20x rally and XRP‚Äôs ETF-driven breakout‚Äînow projects that Mutuum Finance (MUTM) will reach $0.90 by Q4 2025. That‚Äôs a 30x gain from the current price and puts MUTM in line with some of the most legendary returns in the space. Whales who had previously sought shelter in Bitcoin (BTC) or Ethereum (ETH) is now beginning to shift positions, and it‚Äôs becoming increasingly clear that MUTM will be the next magnet for capital rotation. The presale clock is ticking, and with the price set to jump from $0.03 to $0.035 in the next few days, this is the moment smart investors are acting. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is no longer under the radar‚Äîit‚Äôs aiming for the spotlight, and 2025 could be the year it dominates. For more information about Mutuum Finance (MUTM), visit the links below:

HEADLINE: BREAKING: Strategy Acquires 6220 BTC for $740 Million
SUMMARY: Publicly-traded company Strategy Inc. has acquired 6220 BTC for approximately $740 million at an average price just shy of $119,000. The firm, spearheaded by Michael Saylor ‚Äì Wall Street‚Äôs most vocal Bitcoin proponent ‚Äì now holds a whopping 607,770 BTC acquired for $43.6 billion with an average price of $71,756 per coin. Strategy has acquired 6,220 BTC for ~$739.8 million at ~$118,940 per bitcoin and has achieved BTC Yield of 20.8% YTD 2025. As of 7/20/2025, we hodl 607,770 $BTC acquired for ~$43.61 billion at ~$71,756 per bitcoin. $MSTR $STRK $STRF $STRD https://t.co/8z5HygrDWs ‚Äî Michael Saylor (@saylor) July 21, 2025 This is the last in line of multiple previous acquisitions. Last Monday, the company bought another 4225 BTC before Bitcoin‚Äôs price exploded to a new all-time high. Back then, the average price was $111,827. Companies focused on establishing crypto treasuries are becoming more and more common. And while we‚Äôre used to seeing BTC-focused firms, ETH is also starting to attract a lot of attention. Just today, CryptoPotato reported that a Pantera-backed company called The Ether Machine plans to go public with a committed capital of 400,000 ETH. The post BREAKING: Strategy Acquires 6220 BTC for $740 Million appeared first on CryptoPotato .

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Undervalued: PlanB Reveals the Explosive 10x Potential
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Undervalued: PlanB Reveals the Explosive 10x Potential Is Bitcoin truly worth far more than its current price? Prominent analyst PlanB certainly thinks so, igniting a fervent discussion about why Bitcoin is undervalued by a staggering 10 times. This bold assertion isn‚Äôt just a casual remark; it stems from a deep dive into market dynamics, scarcity, and a comparison with traditional safe-haven assets like gold. For anyone navigating the exciting, yet often perplexing, world of cryptocurrencies, understanding this perspective is crucial. It challenges conventional thinking and invites us to consider Bitcoin‚Äôs potential through a different lens. Why is Bitcoin Undervalued According to PlanB? PlanB, widely recognized for his pioneering work on the Stock-to-Flow (S2F) model for Bitcoin, recently took to X (formerly Twitter) to share his compelling analysis. His core argument revolves around a direct comparison between Bitcoin (BTC) and gold, two assets often pitted against each other as stores of value. At the heart of his thesis is a simple, yet profound, observation: gold‚Äôs colossal market capitalization dwarfs Bitcoin‚Äôs, despite Bitcoin possessing superior scarcity characteristics. Let‚Äôs break down PlanB‚Äôs primary points: Market Cap Disparity: Gold, a millennia-old store of wealth, boasts an approximate market capitalization of $20 trillion. In stark contrast, Bitcoin‚Äôs market cap hovers around $2 trillion. This means gold is currently valued at ten times more than Bitcoin. Superior Scarcity: While gold is considered scarce, Bitcoin‚Äôs scarcity is demonstrably higher. PlanB highlights this through their respective Stock-to-Flow (S2F) ratios. Gold‚Äôs S2F ratio is around 60, meaning it would take 60 years of current production to match the existing supply. Bitcoin, on the other hand, boasts an S2F ratio of 120, implying its new supply creation is half as much relative to its existing stock, making it twice as scarce as gold. Consider this side-by-side comparison: Asset Approximate Market Cap Stock-to-Flow Ratio (S2F) Scarcity Relative to Gold Gold $20 Trillion 60 1x Bitcoin (BTC) $2 Trillion 120 2x PlanB‚Äôs conclusion is straightforward: if Bitcoin is twice as scarce as gold, yet only commands one-tenth of its market value, then logically, Bitcoin is undervalued by at least a factor of ten. This isn‚Äôt just a speculative guess; it‚Äôs a quantitative assessment based on fundamental properties of both assets. Decoding the Bitcoin Undervalued Thesis: What Does This Mean for Investors? The assertion that Bitcoin is undervalued carries significant weight, particularly for those looking to understand its long-term investment potential. If PlanB‚Äôs analysis holds true, the implications for future price appreciation could be substantial. However, like any investment thesis, it comes with both promising benefits and important considerations. Potential Benefits for Investors: Significant Upside Potential: The most immediate benefit is the prospect of substantial returns. If Bitcoin were to close the valuation gap with gold, even partially, its price would see exponential growth from current levels. Reinforcement of the Digital Gold Narrative: PlanB‚Äôs comparison strengthens the argument that Bitcoin is a superior form of digital gold. Its verifiable scarcity, ease of transfer, and resistance to censorship make it an attractive alternative in an increasingly digital world. Long-Term Investment Horizon: This thesis encourages a long-term perspective. Rather than focusing on daily price fluctuations, investors are prompted to consider Bitcoin‚Äôs fundamental value proposition over years, even decades. Challenges and Considerations: Market Volatility: Bitcoin is renowned for its price volatility. While the long-term outlook might be bullish, short-term swings can be dramatic and challenging for many investors. Regulatory Landscape: The global regulatory environment for cryptocurrencies is still evolving. Unfavorable regulations in major economies could impact adoption and market sentiment. Adoption Rate: While growing, Bitcoin‚Äôs adoption as a global currency or widespread store of value is still nascent compared to gold. Its full potential hinges on broader acceptance and integration into financial systems. External Factors: Geopolitical events, technological advancements (or setbacks), and shifts in macroeconomic policy can all influence Bitcoin‚Äôs price independent of its intrinsic value. For investors, the actionable insight is not simply to buy Bitcoin because it‚Äôs deemed undervalued. Instead, it‚Äôs to use this analysis as a foundation for deeper research. Understanding the underlying reasons for its perceived undervaluation, alongside the inherent risks, allows for a more informed and strategic approach to portfolio allocation. The Scarcity Factor: How Does it Make Bitcoin Undervalued ? The concept of scarcity is fundamental to value, and it‚Äôs a cornerstone of why PlanB believes Bitcoin is undervalued . Unlike

HEADLINE: Warning: Tomorrow is an important day! The White House is expected to release its first report on cryptocurrencies! Here are the details‚Ä¶
SUMMARY: US President Donald Trump has signed the GENIUS Act into law at the end of a busy week filled with cryptocurrency legislation and regulatory breakthroughs. Following Trump''s move, the White House announced a new step. This time, the White House will release the first comprehensive US crypto policy report, which aims to establish clear rules for digital assets and stablecoins. Accordingly, the report will be announced on July 22. This report will be published as required by Executive Order 14178, which mandates publication within 180 days of the issuance of the relevant decision. As you may recall, Trump signed an executive order titled ‚ÄúStrengthening American Leadership in Digital Financial Technology‚Äù on January 23, 2025, to position the United States as a global leader in the crypto space. The report, to be submitted to the President through APEP, will include recommendations for laws and regulations that will guide US crypto policy. The report will also focus on establishing a clear federal framework for digital assets, including stablecoins. It will also address market structure, oversight, risk management, and consumer protection. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Warning: Tomorrow is an important day! The White House is expected to release its first report on cryptocurrencies! Here are the details‚Ä¶

HEADLINE: Robert Kiyosaki warns of potential bubble burst in Bitcoin, gold, and silver
SUMMARY: Renowned financial educator and Rich Dad Poor Dad author Robert Kiyosaki has raised an alarm, warning investors about the growing risk of a simultaneous Bitcoin, gold, and silver price crash. Despite his long-term bullish stance on these assets, he now signals a strategic pause in buying and advises caution in the face of what he describes as an imminent economic correction. With Bitcoin recently surging past $120,000 to an all-time high, Kiyosaki believes the market may be entering dangerously inflated territory. A bubble ready to burst Kiyosaki‚Äôs latest statements highlight his concern that a broader economic bubble is on the verge of bursting. If that happens, he predicts it will not just impact traditional financial markets but also safe-haven and digital assets alike. Robert Kiyosaki has gone on record saying that when the global economy enters crisis mode, ‚Äúodds are gold, silver, and Bitcoin will bust too.‚Äù Robert Kiyosaki @theRealKiyosaki ¬∑ Follow BUBBLES are about to start BUSTING.When bubbles bust odds are gold, silver, and Bitcoin will bust too.Good news.If prices of gold, silver, and Bitcoin crash‚Ä¶. I will be buying.Take care. 5:52 AM ¬∑ Jul 21, 2025 5.7K Reply Copy link Read 529 replies Although the author has consistently championed Bitcoin and precious metals as hedges against fiat currency devaluation, he acknowledges that no asset is immune to panic-driven selloffs. In his view, the key is not avoiding these assets, but knowing when to hold back and when to buy in aggressively during downturns. Strategic pause in buying after Bitcoin hit new ATH When Bitcoin crossed $117,000 earlier this month, Kiyosaki expressed excitement and said he would buy one more coin. However, as Bitcoin surpassed $120,000 shortly afterwards, he announced a change of course. He declared that he would pause any further purchases until there was more clarity about the economic direction. Kiyosaki emphasised that despite the potential of Bitcoin reaching $200,000 or even $1 million, now is not the time for greed. He referenced the saying, ‚Äúpigs get fat, hogs get slaughtered,‚Äù to warn against overexposure in a frothy market. For now, he prefers to wait for what he sees as an inevitable crash‚Äîafter which he plans to buy more at discounted prices. Bitcoin dominance and market shifts While Bitcoin hit historic highs, its market dominance began to shrink. In just two weeks, its share of the total crypto market has dropped from 67% to 61%. During this period, altcoins like Ethereum and XRP gained traction , posting massive gains. This shift is largely attributed to growing investor appetite for diversification and increased risk tolerance. Additionally, gold has outpaced Bitcoin in 2025 so far, rising nearly 28% since the beginning of the year. While Bitcoin briefly overtook gold in performance, the balance quickly shifted back in favour of the precious metal. This back-and-forth has added another layer of complexity for investors deciding where to allocate capital in an uncertain economic climate. Cautious optimism for the long term Despite warning of a potential crash, Kiyosaki remains bullish on the long-term value of Bitcoin. Kiyosaki continues to project that the digital asset could reach $1 million in the future. However, he strongly advises newcomers to start small and educate themselves thoroughly before diving in. He even suggested that buying fractions of Bitcoin, satoshis, is a prudent first step. Kiyosaki also referenced Warren Buffett‚Äôs strategy of holding massive cash reserves, hinting that many smart investors may be waiting for distressed opportunities before entering the market again. In his words, the real winners will be those who buy after the ‚Äúhogs‚Äù have been slaughtered and prices have crashed. While some may view Kiyosaki‚Äôs warnings as overly cautious or even contradictory, Kiyosaki‚Äôs evolving stance reflects the complexity and volatility of today‚Äôs markets. For traders and investors, the message is clear: stay informed, remain patient, and be ready to act when the tides inevitably turn. The post Robert Kiyosaki warns of potential bubble burst in Bitcoin, gold, and silver appeared first on Invezz

HEADLINE: Shocking: Bitcoin Price Plunges Below $118,000
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Shocking: Bitcoin Price Plunges Below $118,000 The cryptocurrency market is once again sending ripples through the investor community, as the Bitcoin price experienced a notable dip, falling below the critical $118,000 mark. For many, this sudden shift prompts questions about market stability and future trajectories. Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned trader or a curious newcomer, understanding these movements in the Bitcoin price is essential for navigating the volatile digital asset landscape. Understanding the Recent Bitcoin Price Movement According to recent market monitoring, the Bitcoin price has indeed dropped, with reports indicating it trading at $117,981.03 on the Binance USDT market. This movement, while perhaps unsettling for some, is a characteristic feature of the cryptocurrency market. Unlike traditional assets, digital currencies like Bitcoin are known for their rapid fluctuations, driven by a myriad of factors ranging from global economic sentiment to specific technological developments. To put this in perspective, let‚Äôs consider the immediate data: Current Trading Price: $117,981.03 Exchange Monitored: Binance USDT market Key Threshold Breached: $118,000 This particular drop highlights the constant ebb and flow that defines the journey of the Bitcoin price . It‚Äôs a reminder that while Bitcoin has shown incredible long-term growth, short-term volatility remains a constant companion. Why Did the Bitcoin Price Fall? Unpacking the Factors When the Bitcoin price takes a dip, it‚Äôs rarely due to a single cause. Instead, it‚Äôs often a confluence of macroeconomic indicators, market sentiment, and specific industry news. Here are some common factors that could influence such a move: Global Economic Climate Broader economic concerns, such as inflation fears, interest rate hikes by central banks, or geopolitical tensions, often lead investors to de-risk. This means moving away from speculative assets like cryptocurrencies towards more traditional, perceived-as-safer investments. When the global economic outlook becomes uncertain, the Bitcoin price can often feel the ripple effect. Regulatory Scrutiny News or rumors of increased regulatory scrutiny in major markets can also impact the Bitcoin price . Governments worldwide are still grappling with how to regulate digital assets, and any perceived tightening of rules can trigger sell-offs as investors anticipate potential restrictions or compliance burdens. Whale Movements and Market Liquidity Large holders of Bitcoin, often referred to as ‚Äòwhales,‚Äô can significantly influence the Bitcoin price with their buying or selling activities. A substantial sell-off by a whale or a group of whales can quickly increase supply on exchanges, leading to a downward price pressure. Additionally, market liquidity ‚Äì how easily an asset can be bought or sold without affecting its price ‚Äì plays a role. Lower liquidity can amplify price movements. Technical Analysis Triggers For many traders, technical analysis plays a crucial role. Breaking below a significant support level, like $118,000, can trigger automated sell orders or encourage further selling from traders who follow these patterns, contributing to the downward momentum of the Bitcoin price . Historical Context: Is This Bitcoin Price Drop Normal? For those new to the crypto space, a sudden drop in the Bitcoin price might seem alarming. However, seasoned participants know that volatility is part of Bitcoin‚Äôs DNA. Let‚Äôs look at some historical patterns: Period Key Event/Trend Impact on Bitcoin Price 2017-2018 ICO Boom & Bust Massive bull run followed by a significant bear market (80%+ drop). 2020-2021 Pandemic & Institutional Adoption Explosive growth to new all-time highs, despite initial pandemic fears. 2022 Macroeconomic Headwinds & Crypto Events Bear market, major corrections amidst inflation and interest rate hikes. As the table illustrates, periods of significant price corrections are not new for Bitcoin. Each major downturn has historically been followed by a recovery and often new all-time highs. This pattern has led many to view these dips as opportunities rather than just setbacks, reinforcing the resilience of the Bitcoin price over the long term. What Does This Bitcoin Price Dip Mean for Investors? A dip in the Bitcoin price presents a dual perspective for investors: challenges and potential opportunities. Understanding both is key to making informed decisions. Challenges Increased Volatility: Short-term holders might face paper losses, leading to anxiety and potential panic selling. Uncertainty: Market dips can create uncertainty about the immediate future direction of the Bitcoin price , making it harder to plan. Liquidation Risks: For those trading with leverage, significant drops can trigger liquidations, leading to substantial losses. Opportunities Buying Opportunity: Many long-term investors view price corrections as a chance to accumulate more Bitcoin at a lower cost, a strategy known as ‚Äòbuying

HEADLINE: Crypto ETPs See Record $4.4B Inflows as Bitcoin and Ether Surge
SUMMARY: Crypto investment products saw record-breaking inflows last week, marking the 14th consecutive week of gains for crypto ETPs. According to CoinShares, global crypto ETPs recorded $4.4 billion in inflows for the trading week ending Friday, driven by strong market momentum and renewed investor interest. The inflows came as Bitcoin surged past $122,000 for the first time on July 14, before pulling back to an intraweek low of around $116,000 and closing the week near $120,000, data from CoinGecko showed. With the latest gains, year-to-date inflows in crypto ETPs reached a new high of $27 billion, while total assets under management in crypto ETPs crossed $220 billion for the first time. Ether ETPs Hit Record Inflow Ether-focused investment products were a major contributor to the latest inflows, with Ether ETPs posting double their previous weekly record at $2.12 billion. The year-to-date inflows for Ether ETPs reached $6.2 billion, surpassing the total inflows recorded for 2024, according to CoinShares‚Äô head of research James Butterfill. The surge in inflows coincided with ETH crossing $3,500 for the first time since early January, a significant recovery from April‚Äôs lows when ETH dropped below $1,500 amid market pressure . Butterfill noted that the past 13 weeks of consistent inflows now represent 23% of Ethereum‚Äôs assets under management in ETPs, indicating a strong return of investor confidence in Ether as market conditions improved. Bitcoin and Altcoins Maintain Momentum Despite Minor Outflows Bitcoin ETPs also maintained solid inflows, recording $2.2 billion last week, which accounted for 50% of total crypto ETP inflows. The resilience in Bitcoin inflows came even as BTC hit new all-time highs, contrasting with the brief slowdown seen earlier in July as investors grew cautious at higher price levels. Other altcoins such as Solana, XRP, and Sui also saw notable inflows of $39 million, $36 million, and $9.3 million, respectively, reflecting broader interest across the crypto sector. Despite the strong overall inflows, some US issuers recorded minor outflows during the week. Cathie Wood‚Äôs ARK Invest led the losses, posting $120 million in outflows, including an $8.7 million sell-off from its ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF (ARKB). Fidelity Investments and ProShares experienced outflows of $49 million and $25 million, respectively, while CoinShares recorded minor outflows of $25 million, adding to $18 million in outflows from the previous week. The continued strength in crypto ETP inflows, paired with Bitcoin and Ether‚Äôs market resilience, signals sustained institutional interest in crypto assets despite minor corrections and profit-taking, setting a strong foundation for the coming months in the crypto investment landscape. The post Crypto ETPs See Record $4.4B Inflows as Bitcoin and Ether Surge appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

HEADLINE: Michael Saylor''s Strategy Added Another $740M of Bitcoin Last Week
SUMMARY: Michael Saylor''s Strategy''s bitcoin (BTC) stack now stands at 607,770 coins following the acquisition of 6,220 bitcoin in the week ended July 20. The most recent buys were made at an average price of $118,940 each, or a total cost of $740 million. The company''s bitcoin holdings are worth roughly $72 billion at bitcoin''s current price just above $118,000. They were acquired for a total of $43.6 billion, or an average price of $71,756 each. Strategy funded last week''s purchases via the sale of $736.4 million of common stock. Modest sales of the company''s three preferred issuances made for an additional $4 million in capital raising. MSTR shares are up 1.9% in premarket action.

HEADLINE: Bitfinex Alpha | ALTs Rally Follows BTC ATH
SUMMARY: Review full report Subscribe to Bitfinex Alpha Subscribe to Bitfinex Alpha! Want to receive Alpha from Bitfinex every week? Subscribe if (document.cookie.indexOf(''sticky-note-subscribe=1'') === -1) { document.querySelector(''#sticky-note-subscribe'').style.display = ''block''}document.querySelector(''#sticky-note-subscribe-cta'').addEventListener(''click'', (e) => { e.preventDefault(); document.querySelector(''#sticky-note-subscribe'').style.display = ''none'' document.cookie = ''sticky-note-subscribe=1; max-age=7776000'';}); .wp-block-buttons > .wp-block-button { flex: 1;}.wp-block-buttons .wp-block-button .wp-block-button__link { display: block; text-align: center;}.wp-block-buttons .wp-block-button:last-child .wp-block-button__link { background-color: #1ABC91; border-color: #1abc9c; color: #fff;} Bitcoin reached fresh all-time highs of $123,120 last week before cooling off into sideways consolidation, marking a 65.3 percent rally from April‚Äôs lows. As Bitcoin paused, altcoins surged aggressively, with many large caps like Ethereum and XRP outperforming for the first time in months . This shift in momentum triggered a 6.9 percent decline in Bitcoin dominance, the largest since December 2023, suggesting the market is rotating into higher beta assets, a hallmark of mid-cycle expansion phases. Despite Bitcoin‚Äôs consolidation, it continues to trade well above the realised cost basis of 95 percent of holders, highlighting that most of the supply sits in profit. This historically marks late-stage bullish phases where profit-taking by short-term holders intensifies. Long-term holders have started distributing coins for the first time since early 2024, while ETFs, retail, and newer market participants absorb that supply. This natural rotation between holder classes reflects a maturing cycle , but it also raises near-term fragility, especially if buyer momentum fades. Bitcoin briefly pulled back to $115,820 after testing the +1 standard deviation band (œÉ) above the Short-Term Holder cost basis at $120,000, a zone that historically attracts distribution. For the rally to continue, the next resistance lies at the +2œÉ band near $136,000 ‚Äîa level associated with overbought conditions and peak market exuberance. Sustaining momentum to reach that level will likely require renewed institutional inflows or strong macro tailwinds to absorb profit-taking pressure. For now, the baton has passed to altcoins, but Bitcoin‚Äôs structural strength remains intact‚Äîjust entering a more delicate, reactive phase. In the macro economy it is becoming clearer that tariff-driven inflation is surfacing, with June‚Äôs CPI rising 0.3 percent and core inflation up 2.9 percent annually, as higher import costs from China and other key US trading partners push up prices in consumer goods like appliances and apparel. While shelter and services inflation shows mild easing, producer price data points to rising upstream costs and potential ‚Äústagflation-lite‚Äù risks, prompting the Fed to hold off on rate cuts for now . Despite these inflationary pressures, US retail sales rebounded by 0.6 percent in June, driven by auto sales and preemptive consumer buying ahead of further tariff hikes, though real consumption gains remain marginal . Labour market data adds to the mixed picture‚Äîinitial jobless claims are down, but continuing claims and slower wage growth suggest potential softening ahead. In crypto, institutional adoption surged as Strategy (formerly MicroStrategy) became the first public company to hold over 600,000 BTC , now valued above $73 billion. As Bitcoin paused, altcoins surged aggressively, with many large caps like Ethereum and XRP outperforming for the first time in months . This shift in momentum triggered a 6.9 percent decline in Bitcoin dominance, the largest since December 2023, suggesting the market is rotating into higher beta assets, a hallmark of mid-cycle expansion phases. Despite Bitcoin‚Äôs consolidation, it continues to trade well above the realised cost basis of 95 percent of holders, highlighting that most of the supply sits in profit. This historically marks late-stage bullish phases where profit-taking by short-term holders intensifies. Long-term holders have started distributing coins for the first time since early 2024, while ETFs, retail, and newer market participants absorb that supply. This natural rotation between holder classes reflects a maturing cycle , but it also raises near-term fragility, especially if buyer momentum fades. Bitcoin briefly pulled back to $115,820 after testing the +1 standard deviation band (œÉ) above the Short-Term Holder cost basis at $120,000, a zone that historically attracts distribution. For the rally to continue, the next resistance lies at the +2œÉ band near $136,000 ‚Äîa level associated with overbought conditions and peak market exuberance. Sustaining momentum to reach that level will likely require renewed institutional inflows or strong macro tailwinds to absorb profit-taking pressure. For now, the baton has passed to altcoins, but Bitcoin‚Äôs structural strength remains intact‚Äîjust entering a more delicate, reactive phase. In the macro economy it is becoming clearer that tariff-driven inflation is surfacing, with June‚Äôs CPI rising 0.3 percent and core inflation up 2.9 percent annually, as higher import costs from China and other key US trading partners push up prices in consumer goods like appliances and apparel. While shelter and services inflation shows mild easing, producer price data points to rising upstream costs and potential ‚Äústagflation-lite‚Äù risks, prompting the Fed to hold off on rate cuts for now . Despite these inflationary pressures, US retail sales rebounded by 0.6 percent in June, driven by auto sales and preemptive consumer buying ahead of further tariff hikes, though real consumption gains remain marginal . Labour market data adds to the mixed picture‚Äîinitial jobless claims are down, but continuing claims and slower wage growth suggest potential softening ahead. In crypto, institutional adoption surged as Strategy (formerly MicroStrategy) became the first public company to hold over 600,000 BTC , now valued above $73 billion. Meanwhile, Hungary imposed strict penalties for unlicensed crypto trading, forcing major platforms to suspend services, and Kazakhstan is weighing crypto allocations in its sovereign reserves. HEADLINE: Billionaire Michael Saylor Boosts Bitcoin Holdings with New 6,220 BTC Purchase
SUMMARY: Billionaire executive chairman Michael Saylor has bolstered his firm‚Äôs bitcoin war chest once again. Strategy, disclosed on Monday that it had acquired an additional 6,220 BTC for approximately $739.8 million, at an average price of $118,940 per bitcoin during the week ending July 20, 2025. Strategy has acquired 6,220 BTC for ~$739.8 million at ~$118,940 per bitcoin and has achieved BTC Yield of 20.8% YTD 2025. As of 7/20/2025, we hodl 607,770 $BTC acquired for ~$43.61 billion at ~$71,756 per bitcoin. $MSTR $STRK $STRF $STRD https://t.co/8z5HygrDWs ‚Äî Michael Saylor (@saylor) July 21, 2025 This aggressive accumulation brings the company‚Äôs total bitcoin holdings to a staggering 607,770 BTC, purchased at an aggregate cost of $43.61 billion, or an average price of $71,756 per BTC. Purchase Funded via ATM Equity Offerings The filing shows that the bitcoin purchase was financed through proceeds raised under Strategy‚Äôs at-the-market (ATM) equity programs, which span several security classes. Between July 14 and July 20, Strategy raised $740.3 million across four separate ATM programs: MSTR Shares (Common Stock): 1,636,373 shares sold, generating $736.4M in net proceeds STRK Preferred Shares (8.00% Strike): 5,441 shares sold, raising $0.7M STRF Preferred Shares (10.00% Strife): 2,000 shares sold for $0.2M STRD Preferred Shares (10.00% Stride): 31,282 shares sold for $3.0M Each of these instruments falls under massive, multi-billion-dollar issuance programs, including a $21B authorization for both MSTR and STRK classes, demonstrating Saylor‚Äôs continued ability to convert equity into bitcoin reserves at scale. Strategy Now Holds Over $43B in BTC As of July 20, the company holds over $43 billion worth of bitcoin, solidifying its position as the largest corporate holder of BTC globally. With bitcoin‚Äôs price well above Strategy‚Äôs average acquisition cost, the firm is enjoying a year-to-date BTC yield of 20.8% in 2025, reaffirming the effectiveness of its long-term crypto treasury strategy. Saylor remains vocal in his conviction that bitcoin is the world‚Äôs ultimate store of value. The latest acquisition shows his belief that corporate treasuries should hold bitcoin as a primary reserve asset. Strategy‚Äôs accumulating pace and financial engineering continue to make it a bellwether for institutional crypto adoption. Bitcoin‚Äôs Minor Pullback from $123K ATH Bitcoin experienced a potential deeper pullback during Asia trading hours on Monday, after consolidating near $117,000. The crypto is currently just below last week‚Äôs all-time high of $123,000 and is retracing, trading just above $118,263 at the time of writing. Bitcoin has displayed a bullish pennant pattern following a strong vertical rally to $123K. A pennant or a flag formation in July indicates the impending continuation of a strong upward price movement. Despite Bitcoin‚Äôs minor 24-hour decline, several key market announcements have signalled ongoing bullish momentum. For instance, Saylor on Saturday hinted at a new Bitcoin accumulation strategy for his largest corporate BTC holder Strategy, using the phrase ‚ÄúStay humble, stack sats.‚Äù The post Billionaire Michael Saylor Boosts Bitcoin Holdings with New 6,220 BTC Purchase appeared first on Cryptonews .

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Investment: Strategy‚Äôs Spectacular 6,220 BTC Purchase Soars to 20.8% YTD Yield
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Investment: Strategy‚Äôs Spectacular 6,220 BTC Purchase Soars to 20.8% YTD Yield In the dynamic world of cryptocurrency, where fortunes are made and strategies are meticulously crafted, one company consistently stands out for its unwavering commitment to Bitcoin: Strategy. Recently, the crypto community buzzed with news of their latest, audacious move, signaling not just a significant Bitcoin investment but also a remarkable financial triumph. This isn‚Äôt just a ripple in the crypto pond; it‚Äôs a tidal wave that speaks volumes about institutional confidence in the digital asset space. Strategy, a leading Bitcoin investment company, recently made headlines with a massive acquisition. They announced on X (formerly Twitter) that they purchased an additional 6,220 BTC for approximately $739.8 million. This significant acquisition was made at an average price of roughly $118,940 per Bitcoin, showcasing a bold move in the market. What‚Äôs even more impressive is that this strategic purchase has contributed to an astounding year-to-date (YTD) Bitcoin yield of 20.8% for 2025. As of July 20, the firm now proudly holds a staggering 607,770 BTC, acquired for an estimated $43.61 billion at an average price of around $71,756 per BTC. This latest move reaffirms Strategy‚Äôs position as a dominant force in the institutional Bitcoin investment landscape. Decoding Strategy‚Äôs Latest Bitcoin Investment Move When a company like Strategy, known for its aggressive Bitcoin accumulation strategy, makes such a substantial purchase, the market takes notice. The acquisition of 6,220 BTC for nearly $740 million at an average price north of $118,000 per coin highlights a profound conviction in Bitcoin‚Äôs future trajectory. While this price point might seem high to some, it aligns with Strategy‚Äôs long-term vision, demonstrating their belief that Bitcoin‚Äôs value will continue to appreciate significantly over time, making even current prices attractive for strategic accumulation. To put this latest Bitcoin investment into perspective, let‚Äôs look at how it integrates into their existing colossal holdings. Strategy has been systematically adding Bitcoin to its treasury for years, treating it as a primary reserve asset. This latest purchase is another testament to their ‚ÄòBitcoin for corporate treasury‚Äô playbook, which has proven remarkably successful. Bitcoin Investment: Strategy''s Spectacular 6,220 BTC Purchase Soars to 20.8% YTD Yield Metric Before Latest Purchase (Approx.) After Latest Purchase (As of July 20) Total BTC Holdings 601,550 BTC 607,770 BTC Total Acquired Cost $42.87 billion $43.61 billion Average Price per BTC $71,260 $71,756 This isn‚Äôt merely a transaction; it‚Äôs a strategic maneuver that underscores Strategy‚Äôs profound conviction in Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term value proposition. They are not just buying Bitcoin; they are building a fortress of digital assets, setting a precedent for how corporations might manage their treasuries in an increasingly digital world. How Does This Bitcoin Investment Impact Strategy‚Äôs Portfolio? The impact of this latest acquisition on Strategy‚Äôs portfolio is substantial, not just in terms of sheer volume but also in demonstrating the effectiveness of their long-term accumulation strategy. With 607,770 BTC now under their belt, acquired at an average price of approximately $71,756, Strategy possesses one of the largest corporate holdings of Bitcoin globally. This scale provides them with significant leverage and exposure to Bitcoin‚Äôs price movements. However, the real headline-grabber is the reported 20.8% year-to-date (YTD) yield for 2025. Imagine achieving over a fifth of your initial investment back in profit within just seven months! This figure signifies that, despite the substantial recent purchase at a higher price, Strategy‚Äôs overall Bitcoin portfolio has appreciated considerably since the start of the year. This impressive yield is a powerful testament to Strategy‚Äôs shrewd capital allocation and the inherent volatility ‚Äì and potential upside ‚Äì of the Bitcoin market. It suggests that their earlier, lower-cost acquisitions are providing a significant buffer, allowing them to absorb higher-priced purchases while maintaining a strong overall profit margin. Key takeaways from Strategy‚Äôs portfolio performance include: Strategic Averaging: Despite buying at $118,940, their overall average acquisition cost remains much lower, showcasing the power of dollar-cost averaging over time for a large-scale Bitcoin investment . Conviction Over Short-Term Volatility: The consistent purchases, even during market fluctuations, highlight a deep conviction in Bitcoin‚Äôs fundamental value and its role as a long-term store of value. Leading Indicator: Strategy‚Äôs success with this approach serves as a potential blueprint for other corporations considering Bitcoin for their balance sheets. Their reported yield acts as a tangible performance metric that other treasurers might observe closely. This strategy isn‚Äô

HEADLINE: R. Kiyosaki warns market ‚Äòbubbles are about to burst‚Äô
SUMMARY: Robert Kiyosaki , American entrepreneur, motivational speaker, and author, is predicting that various asset ‚Äúbubbles‚Äù are about to start ‚Äúbusting.‚Äù When the Bitcoin ( BTC ) bubble bursts, i.e., when the asset plummets, the author of Rich Dad Poor Dad warns in a post on X, gold and silver are going to follow suit. While seemingly bearish in his outlook, Kiyosaki implies a crash would actually be a good investment opportunity ‚Äî If the prices tank, he says, he‚Äôll start buying. ‚ÄúBUBBLES are about to start BUSTING. When bubbles bust odds are gold, silver, and Bitcoin will bust too.‚Äù ‚Äì R. Kiyosaki BUBBLES are about to start BUSTING. When bubbles bust odds are gold, silver, and Bitcoin will bust too. Good news. If prices of gold, silver, and Bitcoin crash‚Ä¶. I will be buying. Take care. ‚Äî Robert Kiyosaki (@theRealKiyosaki) July 21, 2025 Is Bitcoin safe? Bitcoin recently hit an all-time high (ATH), peaking above $123,000 . However, a pullback of roughly 5%, which saw the price drop to the $118,000 range by the time of Kiyosaki‚Äôs prediction, might now suggest a potential market cooldown. Moreover, the Consumer Price Index (CPI) info released on July 15 revealed that inflation was higher than expected, having gone up by 2.7%, while the national debt has exceeded $36 trillion. The investor‚Äôs predictions thus suggest the mounting pressure is being felt in the crypto market, which is now nearing a valuation of $4 trillion. To put things into perspective, Bitcoin alone has surpassed Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN ) in terms of market capitalization . BTC price analysis At the time of writing, Bitcoin was actually performing solidly from a daily technical standpoint, with a price of $118,422. BTC 24-hour price performance. Source: CoinMarketCap According to data on CoinMarketCap , the price remains above key short-term support levels, including the 7-day simple moving average of $118,414 and the 23.6% Fibonacci retracement at $117,238. Trading volume is also up, having jumped 36.89% in 24 hours to nearly $66 billion, confirming solid buyer engagement. A bullish moving average convergence divergence ( MACD ) histogram (+125.34) and relative strength index ( RSI ) of 62.88 suggest ongoing upward momentum without being overbought. Featured image via Shutterstock The post R. Kiyosaki warns market ‚Äòbubbles are about to burst‚Äô appeared first on Finbold .

HEADLINE: Solana Smashes $100B Market Cap as Price Eyes $200 Breakout
SUMMARY: The post Solana Smashes $100B Market Cap as Price Eyes $200 Breakout appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Solana has crossed the $100B market cap again, gaining 6% in the past 24 hours. With capital rotating out of Bitcoin, top altcoins like Ethereum, Dogecoin, and Cardano are also seeing renewed interest. Solana DeFi TVL Hits $10.26B Solana‚Äôs DeFi ecosystem is booming, with total value locked (TVL) jumping to $10.26 billion, the highest in nearly six months. This surge is largely driven by SOL‚Äôs price rally. Leading the pack are Jito Sol ($3.09B), Jupiter Exchange ($2.90B), and Kamino Finance ($2.89B). REPORT: @Solana DeFi TVL has surged to $10.26 billion for the first time in 23 weeks, driven by $SOL price appreciation. Top DeFi protocols: > Jito Sol: $3.09 billion > Jupiter Exchange: $2.90 billion > Kamino Finance: $2.89 billion pic.twitter.com/2fWMAyEdfG ‚Äî SolanaFloor (@SolanaFloor) July 21, 2025 Data from the Solana floor shows that over the past week, $180 million has been bridged to Solana from other blockchains, with $90 million coming from Ethereum alone. That is a 44% increase compared to the previous week, which shows growing interest and inflows into the Solana ecosystem. Also, Solana-based perpetual trading platforms are seeing more Solana liquidations on-chain than all centralized exchanges combined during times of high market activity. This is a sign of shifting trader behavior. Retail Interest and Short Squeeze Push SOL Toward $200 In the past 24 hours alone, over $11 million in SOL short positions were liquidated as the token climbed to $191. The largest single liquidation hit $1.13 million at $188, showing just how fast sentiment is flipping. Solana is also seeing strong retail interest, with open interest in SOL futures jumping to $9.5 billion from $7.1 billion. Trading volume also jumped 80% in the past day to over $20 billion. With more short sellers getting liquidated, the price is being pushed higher, possibly past $200 soon. Strong Inflows Keep Solana in the Spotlight CoinShares report reveals that Solana-based digital asset products like ETFs, funds, and ETPs saw $39.1 million in inflows last week. While Bitcoin led overall with $2.19 billion, Solana inflows were also notable among other altcoins. Solana also continues to lead all Layer 1 and Layer 2 blockchains in network revenue, now for the 17th straight week, highlighting its strong and consistent on-chain activity. Analysts Eye Breakout It is currently trading at $190.80, up 5.7% in the last 24 hours. Analyst Ali Martinez had recently shared that $189 is a key breakout level for Solana. If SOL moves above it, there are not many strong resistance zones ahead, and the price could climb quickly from there. Once Solana $SOL breaks above $189, there‚Äôs little standing in the way of a continued rally. pic.twitter.com/IOwvdPMMJ7 ‚Äî Ali (@ali_charts) July 21, 2025 Glassnode says around 8 million SOL were bought near $190, so it‚Äôs a major resistance level. If Solana breaks above it and demand stays strong, the price could rise quickly since there is less selling pressure above that point.

Also, Solana-based perpetual trading platforms are seeing more Solana liquidations on-chain than all centralized exchanges combined during times of high market activity. This is a sign of shifting trader behavior. Retail Interest and Short Squeeze Push SOL Toward $200 In the past 24 hours alone, over $11 million in SOL short positions were liquidated as the token climbed to $191. The largest single liquidation hit $1.13 million at $188, showing just how fast sentiment is flipping. Solana is also seeing strong retail interest, with open interest in SOL futures jumping to $9.5 billion from $7.1 billion. Trading volume also jumped 80% in the past day to over $20 billion. With more short sellers getting liquidated, the price is being pushed higher, possibly past $200 soon. Strong Inflows Keep Solana in the Spotlight CoinShares report reveals that Solana-based digital asset products like ETFs, funds, and ETPs saw $39.1 million in inflows last week. While Bitcoin led overall with $2.19 billion, Solana inflows were also notable among other altcoins. Solana also continues to lead all Layer 1 and Layer 2 blockchains in network revenue, now for the 17th straight week, highlighting its strong and consistent on-chain activity. Analysts Eye Breakout It is currently trading at $190.80, up 5.7% in the last 24 hours. Analyst Ali Martinez had recently shared that $189 is a key breakout level for Solana. If SOL moves above it, there are not many strong resistance zones ahead, and the price could climb quickly from there. Once Solana $SOL breaks above $189, there‚Äôs little standing in the way of a continued rally. pic.twitter.com/IOwvdPMMJ7 ‚Äî Ali (@ali_charts) July 21, 2025 Glassnode says around 8 million SOL were bought near $190, so it‚Äôs a major resistance level. If Solana breaks above it and demand stays strong, the price could rise quickly since there is less selling pressure above that point.

HEADLINE: Trump Media Discloses $2B Bitcoin Stack
SUMMARY: Trump Media and Technology Group (DJT) Monday morning disclosed a bitcoin (BTC) stack worth about $2 billion. At bitcoin''s current price in the $118,000 area, that would mean around 17,000 coins. "We''re rigorously implementing our publicly announced strategy and fulfilling our bitcoin treasury plan," said CEO Devin Nunes in a press release. "These assets help ensure our Company''s financial freedom, help protect us against discrimination by financial institutions, and will create synergies with the utility token we''re planning to introduce across the Truth Social ecosphere." The company has another $300 million in an options strategy for the acquisition of bitcoin-related securities. DJT in late May launched a $2.5 billion capital raise with the intention of using the money for a bitcoin treasury strategy. Shares are higher by 6.5% in premarket trade.

HEADLINE: The Weekly Critical Report for Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), XRP and Solana (SOL) Has Arrived: This Altcoin Made a Big Attack, Catching Up with Bitcoin!
SUMMARY: Following the rally in Bitcoin, Ethereum took the lead, and ETH surpassed $3,700 after a long period. This rise in Ethereum has also had a positive impact on altcoins, with significant gains seen. While the major altcoin season is expected to begin, CoinShares released its weekly cryptocurrency report, reporting $4.39 billion in inflows last week. Cryptocurrency investment products saw an all-time high of $4.39 billion in inflows. Year-to-date inflows reached $27 billion, and assets under management (AUM) reached a record $220 billion. Ethereum Goes on the Attack! When looking at individual crypto funds, it was seen that the majority of inflows were in Bitcoin. However, Ethereum also experienced a major surge. While BTC saw an inflow of $2.19 billion, positive sentiment prevailed in Ethereum (ETH), with an inflow of $2.11 billion. Looking at other altcoins, XRP saw an inflow of $36.1 million, Solana (SOL) $39.1 million, and Sui (SUI) $9.3 million. Ethereum stole the show by attracting record inflows of $2.12 billion, nearly double its previous record of $1.2 billion. The last 13 weeks of inflows represent 23% of Ethereum Asset Management, and 2025 inflows have already surpassed the full-year total inflows for 2024 of $6.2 billion. While Bitcoin saw $2.2 billion inflows, down from $2.7 billion last week, Solana, XRP, and Sui attracted attention with inflows of $39 million, $36 million, and $9.3 million, respectively. When looking at regional fund inflows and outflows, the USA ranked first with an inflow of $4.36 billion. Following the USA, Switzerland had an inflow of $47 million and Hong Kong $14.1 million. Against these inflows, Brazil experienced an outflow of $28.1 million and Sweden $21 million. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: The Weekly Critical Report for Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), XRP and Solana (SOL) Has Arrived: This Altcoin Made a Big Attack, Catching Up with Bitcoin!

HEADLINE: Can ADA Price Hit $12? Bullish Signals Mount
SUMMARY: The post Can ADA Price Hit $12? Bullish Signals Mount appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The ADA price has most recently posted a remarkable 9% intraday gain, climbing to $0.90 and breaking past a significant resistance level at $0.85, which is the highest level since May 12. This resurgence reflects growing bullish momentum as Cardano price regains investor interest. The reclaiming of this level now marks a potential turning point in ADA crypto‚Äôs near-term structure. Technical Tailwinds: Golden Cross Patterns Forming Supporting this upward trend in ADA price are key technical indicators. A short-term golden cross formed early July between the 20-day and 50-day exponential moving averages (EMA). Now, the ADA price is nearing a more influential long-term golden cross, where the 50-day EMA is set to cross above the 200-day EMA. This setup is widely seen as a strong bullish continuation signal, and if confirmed, may drive further accumulation from traders and institutions alike. ETF Speculation and Market Sentiment Lift Outlook In addition to the charts, fundamental developments are fueling ADA crypto‚Äôs optimism. One of the major drivers is speculation around a potential spot ADA ETF approval by the SEC in 2025. With recent Proshares ultra XRP ETF approved, the altcoins approval odds have spiked, which includes ADA ETF too. Therefore, the rising traction pushes hopes to next level with Cardano next in line, if only the regulatory climate continues to shift in favor of altcoins. Adding to the sentiment is the anticipation of the Midnight airdrop , it is seen as influential move and expected to drive user engagement. That said, the broader belief that the crypto market rally is still having legs. Based on that, if Bitcoin price manages to sustain a new leg up, altcoins like ADA price could ride the wave. Analysts Weigh In: Targets from $1 to $12.86 While some investors are cautiously eyeing the $1 milestone, crypto analyst Ali Martinez believes $1 is no longer a question, but the beginning of a potential extended rally. Meanwhile, Dan Gambardello, a known Cardano supporter, presented a more ambitious case for ADA price. Bullish case. $Ada ETF approved, quantitative easing begins. Bitcoin ends up making it to 250k and cardano reaches a 4.5% market dominance at its peak, which is just a couple tenths of a percent higher than it typically does. You''re looking at a $12.86 ADA ‚Äì CCV Subscriber pic.twitter.com/J02h1PtVvu ‚Äî Dan Gambardello (@cryptorecruitr) July 21, 2025 In his recent post on X, he explained that under specific conditions, like ETF approvals from major asset managers (AUMs), Bitcoin reaching $250,000, and Cardano‚Äôs market dominance hitting 4.5%, meeting all checks, the ADA price could reach as high as $12.86.

HEADLINE: Hold On For Dear Life: This Bullish Bitcoin Metric Just Touched A 15-Year High
SUMMARY: The percentage of Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term holders‚Äô supply has reached a 15-year high, providing a bullish outlook for the flagship crypto. Asset manager Ark Invest highlighted this development in a recent report and explained what this could mean for BTC going forward. Bitcoin Long-Term Holders Supply Hit 74% According to the Ark Invest report, the long-term holders‚Äô supply has reached 74% of Bitcoin‚Äôs total supply, marking a 15-year high for this metric. The asset manager noted that this trend indicates growing market conviction in BTC‚Äôs role as a store of value or ‚Äúdigital gold.‚Äù These long-term holders refer to addresses that have held for 155 days or longer. Related Reading: Michael Saylor Reveals The Only Thing ‚ÄòBetter Than Bitcoin‚Äô As MSTR Stock Outperforms This development comes at a time when Bitcoin is witnessing massive demand from institutional investors through the ETFs and treasury companies. These investors are considered better ‚Äòdiamond-hands‚Äô than retail investors, which means that this metric could keep rising, with long-term holders gaining more control of BTC‚Äôs total supply. This institutional buying has also driven the Bitcoin price to several all-time highs (ATHs) this year, with BTC reaching as high as $123,000 last week. The flagship crypto appears to still be in price discovery, as ETFs led by BlackRock and treasury companies, led by Saylor‚Äôs Strategy, continue to accumulate at an unprecedented pace. Cathie Wood‚Äôs Ark Invest is ultra bullish on the Bitcoin price, predicting that it could reach $1.5 million by 2030. They expect BTC to reach this target due to the rising institutional investment and global recognition of Bitcoin‚Äôs ability to serve as a store of value. In a CNBC interview, Cathie Wood also doubled down on this prediction. She explained that they expect BTC to take a significant share from gold or grow the store of value market. Wood added that institutions are still just testing the waters despite the massive accumulation so far. As such, she still expects a rise in adoption for these companies. Meanwhile, only about 1 million unmined Bitcoins are remaining. Other Bullish Metrics For BTC The Ark Invest report also revealed that global liquidity per bitcoin reached a 12-year high. This metric reached this high with $5.7 million in global M2 supply per BTC in circulation. The asset manager remarked that this ratio could continue to rise given Bitcoin‚Äôs diminishing future supply growth and the continued expansion of global liquidity. Related Reading: This Analyst Predicted Bitcoin‚Äôs Rally To $120,000 Months Ago, Here‚Äôs The Rest Of The Forecast Meanwhile, in June, Bitcoin managed to hold above the support between $96,000 and $99,000 and is now well above these levels. $98,888, $96,278, and $71,393 are BTC‚Äôs short-term holder cost basis, 200-day moving average, and on-chain mean, respectively, which is why this development is bullish for the flagship crypto. At the time of writing, the Bitcoin price is trading at around $19,100, up in the last 24 hours, according to data from CoinMarketCap. Featured image from Pixabay, chart from Tradingview.com

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Triumph: Profusa‚Äôs Landmark $100M Investment Signals a New Era for Corporate Treasuries
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Triumph: Profusa‚Äôs Landmark $100M Investment Signals a New Era for Corporate Treasuries In a move that is capturing the attention of both the financial world and the burgeoning digital asset space, Profusa, a Nasdaq-listed digital healthcare company (NASDAQ: PFSA), has announced a groundbreaking plan to invest a substantial sum of up to $100 million in Bitcoin. This bold Bitcoin investment is set to become a cornerstone of the company‚Äôs treasury strategy, marking a significant pivot for a publicly traded entity in the healthcare sector. What Does Profusa‚Äôs Bitcoin Investment Entail? Imagine a healthcare company, traditionally focused on medical innovation, making a strategic leap into the world of cryptocurrency. That‚Äôs precisely what Profusa is doing. According to a GlobeNewswire press release, the company has entered into a stock purchase agreement with Ascent Partners Fund, through which it plans to allocate a significant portion of its capital to the leading digital asset. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of Profusa‚Äôs audacious plan: Up to $100 Million Commitment: Profusa intends to invest a maximum of $100 million in Bitcoin. This is a substantial sum, reflecting a strong conviction in Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term value. Primary Treasury Asset: The company will use all net proceeds above a $5 million cash reserve to acquire Bitcoin. This means Bitcoin isn‚Äôt just a side investment; it‚Äôs being positioned as Profusa‚Äôs primary treasury asset, a role traditionally held by fiat currencies, bonds, or other stable financial instruments. Imminent Purchases: Profusa expects to begin its initial Bitcoin purchases as early as this week, signaling a rapid execution of its new strategy. Quarterly Reporting: Transparency will be key, as the company plans to report its Bitcoin holdings quarterly, allowing investors and the market to track its digital asset portfolio. This decision by Profusa highlights a growing trend among forward-thinking corporations to explore alternative treasury management strategies, moving beyond conventional assets to embrace the potential of digital currencies. Why Are Companies Considering Bitcoin Investment for Their Treasuries? The question on many minds is, why Bitcoin? For years, corporate treasuries have relied on traditional assets like cash, short-term bonds, and money market funds to preserve capital and maintain liquidity. However, in an evolving economic landscape, these conventional approaches face new challenges. Several factors are driving companies to consider a Bitcoin investment : Inflation Hedge: With global inflation concerns on the rise, many companies are seeking assets that can preserve or even grow their purchasing power. Bitcoin, with its finite supply (capped at 21 million coins), is often viewed as a potential hedge against inflation, similar to digital gold. Diversification: Adding Bitcoin to a treasury portfolio offers diversification away from traditional financial instruments, potentially reducing overall portfolio risk in the long term by not having all assets tied to a single economic system or currency. Potential for Appreciation: Bitcoin has historically shown significant price appreciation, attracting companies looking to generate returns on their idle cash reserves rather than seeing them erode due to inflation or low interest rates. Technological Innovation and Future-Proofing: Embracing Bitcoin aligns companies with the cutting edge of financial technology. It signals an understanding of the evolving digital economy and positions the company as innovative and forward-looking. Low Interest Rate Environment: In an era of near-zero or even negative interest rates, holding large cash reserves can be costly. Bitcoin offers an alternative with potential for yield, albeit with higher volatility. The Benefits and Risks of Corporate Bitcoin Investment While the allure of a Bitcoin investment is strong, it‚Äôs crucial to understand both the potential benefits and the inherent risks involved. Profusa‚Äôs move, while bold, comes with its own set of considerations. Potential Benefits: Capital Appreciation: As seen with early corporate adopters like MicroStrategy, significant gains can be realized if Bitcoin‚Äôs value continues to rise over time. Enhanced Shareholder Value: A successful Bitcoin strategy can potentially increase the company‚Äôs asset base and, consequently, shareholder value. Innovation Leadership: Being an early adopter in a new asset class can position a company as a leader and innovator within its industry and the broader market. Attracting New Investors: Companies embracing digital assets may appeal to a new segment of investors interested in the crypto space. Potential Risks: Price Volatility: Bitcoin is notoriously volatile. Its price can experience significant swings, which could impact the company‚Äôs balance sheet and quarterly earnings. Regulatory Uncertainty: The regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies is still evolving. Changes in regulations could i

HEADLINE: Easily Start Your Dogecoin and Bitcoin Mining Journey: ZA Miner Cloud Mining App Gains Momentum
SUMMARY: The world of Bitcoin and Dogecoin mining is experiencing a major shift in 2025. HEADLINE: Trump Media Has Acquired $2 Billion Worth of Bitcoin
SUMMARY: Trump Media and Technology Group (or just Trump Media for convenience) ‚Äì the company closely associated with the family of the acting president Donald Trump ‚Äì has accumulated around $2 billion worth of BTC. According to a recent release, Trump Media now holds approximately $2 billion worth of BTC and bitcoin-related securities. It‚Äôs not clarified what the related securities are, but it could be ETFs. The company has approximately $3 billion in liquid assets, which means that the share of bitcoin-related products accounts for around two thirds of it all. Commenting on the matter was President Devin Nunes, who said: We‚Äôre rigorously implementing our publicly announced strategy and fulfilling our bitcoin treasury plan. These assets help ensure our Company‚Äôs financial freedom, help protect us against discrimantion by financial institutions, and will create synergies with the utility token we‚Äôre planning to introduce across the Truth Social ecosphere. Trump Media operates Truth Social ‚Äì the platform used by President Donald Trump to make announcements, currently bringing in over 32 million users per month, according to SimilarWeb. As CryptoPotato previously reported , Trump Media has previously filed to launch a spot Bitcoin and Ethereum exchange-traded fund. If approved, the vehicle will hold BTC and ETH directly in a ratio of 75/25. The post Trump Media Has Acquired $2 Billion Worth of Bitcoin appeared first on CryptoPotato .

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Price to Hit $250K This Year, Says Fundstrat‚Äôs Tom Lee
SUMMARY: The post Bitcoin Price to Hit $250K This Year, Says Fundstrat‚Äôs Tom Lee appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Crypto fans, you‚Äôll want to know this! In a bold forecast on CNBC, Tom Lee, co-founder of Fundstrat Global Advisors, has doubled down on his bullish Bitcoin stance. He predicts the leading cryptocurrency could reach $250,000 before the end of 2025. With Bitcoin currently trading at $118,760.61, up nearly 60% from $70,000, Lee believes the rally is far from over. What stands out is his reasoning. Even at $250,000, Bitcoin would represent only 25% of the gold market‚Äôs value, leaving significant room for growth. Is Bitcoin‚Äôs Big Leap Coming? Lee points out that Bitcoin is increasingly being viewed as a macro asset, similar to gold. This shift in perception is driving more capital into the market. ‚ÄúEven at $250,000, Bitcoin would only be valued at 25% of the gold market,‚Äù Lee said during the interview, highlighting how much potential Bitcoin still has. Institutional interest is rising steadily, and figures like Michael Saylor continue to make the case for Bitcoin as a long-term store of value . Combined with recent political support, Lee sees a strong case for significant upside this year. Long-Term Outlook: Bitcoin Over $1 Million? Lee is also thinking long term. He believes Bitcoin could eventually be worth more than $1 million per coin. The logic is simple. If Bitcoin truly becomes digital gold, its valuation should reflect that. ‚ÄúDigital gold means Bitcoin; should be worth over a million,‚Äù Lee said, pointing to the asset‚Äôs growing role as a hedge against inflation and currency risk. He also noted the influence of recent pro-crypto policies under President Trump . Bills like the Genius Act could further strengthen Bitcoin‚Äôs position and support the broader bull run. Crypto Twitter Reacts Lee‚Äôs forecast didn‚Äôt go unnoticed. Crypto Twitter was quick to respond with a mix of optimism, skepticism, and sharp analysis. One user on X wrote, ‚Äú$250K sounds wild, until you zoom out and realize‚Ä¶‚Äù suggesting that while ambitious, the target may not be as far-fetched as it sounds. $250K sounds wild, until you zoom out and realize‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs just one more leg in the pattern. ‚Äî Mind Math Money (@MindMathMoney) July 21, 2025 This reaction reflects the mood of the broader crypto community, where bold predictions are often met with both excitement and healthy doubt. What‚Äôs Next for Bitcoin? As the crypto market expands and institutions continue to get involved, Lee‚Äôs predictions are sparking important conversations about Bitcoin‚Äôs future. If pro-crypto legislation continues to gain traction and adoption trends stay strong, the journey to $250,000 could become more realistic than many expect. .article_register_shortcode { padding: 18px 24px; border-radius: 8px; display: flex; align-items: center; margin: 6px 0 22px; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 0%, rgba(0, 82, 204, 0.1) 100%); } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 { color: #000000; font-weight: 600; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; text-align:left; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 span { color: #0052CC; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { font-weight: 400; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; color: #171717B2; margin-top: 4px; text-align:left; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body{ padding-right: 14px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-button a { float: right; } .article_register_shortcode .primary-button img{ vertical-align: middle; width: 20px; margin: 0; display: inline-block; } @media (min-width: 581px) and (max-width: 991px) { .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { margin-bottom: 0; } } @media (max-width: 580px) { .article_register_shortcode { display: block; padding: 20px; } .article_register_shortcode img { max-width: 50px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 { font-size: 16px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body { margin-left: 0px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { font-size: 13px; line-height: 20px; margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 14px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-button a { float: unset; } .article_register_shortcode .secondary-button { margin-bottom: 0; } } Never Miss a Beat in the Crypto World! HEADLINE: Bitcoin Bonanza: Trump Media‚Äôs Bold $2 Billion Treasury Strategy Unveiled
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Bonanza: Trump Media‚Äôs Bold $2 Billion Treasury Strategy Unveiled Are you ready for a seismic shift in corporate finance? The world of digital assets just got another massive endorsement from an unexpected corner. Trump Media and Technology Group Corp. (Nasdaq: DJT) has made headlines with a stunning revelation: the company has amassed an astounding $2 billion in Bitcoin and Bitcoin -related securities as a core component of its treasury strategy. This isn‚Äôt just a minor allocation; it represents a significant two-thirds of its $3 billion in liquid assets, signaling a bold and decisive move into the future of finance. What does this mean for the company, the crypto market, and the broader corporate world? What‚Äôs Behind Trump Media‚Äôs Massive Bitcoin Bet? In a move that has sent ripples across financial markets, Trump Media and Technology Group Corp., known for its social media platform Truth Social, officially announced its substantial foray into the world of digital gold. According to a Globe Newswire press release, the company has strategically accumulated approximately $2 billion worth of Bitcoin and other assets closely tied to the cryptocurrency‚Äôs performance. This allocation is not just a speculative venture but a cornerstone of their meticulously planned Bitcoin treasury strategy. To put this into perspective, consider the scale: Total Liquid Assets: Trump Media holds $3 billion in liquid assets. Bitcoin Allocation: A staggering $2 billion, or roughly 66.7%, of these liquid assets, is now in Bitcoin and related instruments. Strategic Options: An additional $300 million has been earmarked for acquiring options in Bitcoin -related securities, with clear intentions to convert these into spot Bitcoin when market conditions are deemed favorable. This aggressive posture suggests a long-term conviction in Bitcoin ‚Äòs role as a store of value and a hedge against traditional economic uncertainties. It positions DJT not just as a tech company, but as a significant player in the evolving landscape of corporate digital asset management. Why Are Companies Embracing Bitcoin for Their Treasury? Trump Media‚Äôs decision isn‚Äôt an isolated incident; it‚Äôs part of a growing trend among forward-thinking corporations. The question on many executives‚Äô minds is: why hold traditional cash when you can potentially grow your reserves with a digital asset like Bitcoin ? Companies are increasingly looking beyond conventional treasury management to innovative strategies that protect and potentially enhance their capital. Here are some compelling reasons: Inflation Hedge: In an era of quantitative easing and rising inflation concerns, Bitcoin ‚Äòs fixed supply (21 million coins) offers a stark contrast to fiat currencies, whose supply can be expanded indefinitely. Many see it as a digital alternative to gold, a traditional inflation hedge. Store of Value: Despite its volatility, Bitcoin has demonstrated remarkable resilience and long-term appreciation. For companies with excess cash reserves, holding Bitcoin can be a strategy to preserve purchasing power over time. Growth Potential: The digital asset market is still nascent, and many believe Bitcoin has substantial room for growth as adoption increases globally. Investing in Bitcoin can offer significant upside potential for corporate balance sheets. Diversification: Adding Bitcoin to a treasury portfolio can provide diversification away from traditional assets like stocks, bonds, and fiat currency, potentially reducing overall portfolio risk. However, it‚Äôs crucial to acknowledge the challenges. Bitcoin ‚Äòs price volatility can be extreme, leading to significant fluctuations in a company‚Äôs balance sheet. Regulatory uncertainty also remains a concern, with governments worldwide still grappling with how to classify and oversee digital assets. Security risks, such as hacks and cyber theft, also demand robust internal controls and expertise. Trump Media joins a notable list of companies that have embraced Bitcoin for their treasury, including pioneers like MicroStrategy, which holds billions in Bitcoin , and tech giants such as Tesla, which previously made a significant purchase. These examples illustrate a growing conviction in Bitcoin ‚Äòs long-term viability as a corporate asset. Understanding the Nuances of Bitcoin -Related Securities and Options Trump Media‚Äôs announcement specified holdings in both direct Bitcoin and ‚Äú Bitcoin -related securities,‚Äù alongside a substantial allocation for ‚Äúoptions acquisition.‚Äù What exactly do these terms mean in the context of a corporate treasury strategy? Bitcoin -Related Securities: These are financial instruments whose value is directly tied to the price of Bitcoin , but they are not actual spot Bitcoin . They can include: Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs): Such as spot Bitcoin ETFs, which hold actual Bitcoin and allow investors to gain exposure without directly owning the cryptocurrency. Trusts: Like Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC), whi

Trump Media joins a notable list of companies that have embraced Bitcoin for their treasury, including pioneers like MicroStrategy, which holds billions in Bitcoin , and tech giants such as Tesla, which previously made a significant purchase. These examples illustrate a growing conviction in Bitcoin ‚Äòs long-term viability as a corporate asset. Understanding the Nuances of Bitcoin -Related Securities and Options Trump Media‚Äôs announcement specified holdings in both direct Bitcoin and ‚Äú Bitcoin -related securities,‚Äù alongside a substantial allocation for ‚Äúoptions acquisition.‚Äù What exactly do these terms mean in the context of a corporate treasury strategy? Bitcoin -Related Securities: These are financial instruments whose value is directly tied to the price of Bitcoin , but they are not actual spot Bitcoin . They can include: Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs): Such as spot Bitcoin ETFs, which hold actual Bitcoin and allow investors to gain exposure without directly owning the cryptocurrency. HEADLINE: The Ether Machine to list on Nasdaq in $1.6B SPAC deal with 400K ETH
SUMMARY: According to a Reuters report , a new Ethereum-based venture is preparing to enter the public market through a $1.6 billion merger with blank-check firm Dynamix Corporation (DYNX). Known as The Ether Reserve, the firm will relist under the name The Ether Machine and is expected to launch with more than 400,000 Ether (ETH) on its balance sheet‚Äîmaking it the largest publicly traded vehicle offering direct institutional exposure to Ethereum. The deal represents a significant moment for Ethereum in the context of public markets. While Bitcoin has been the primary crypto asset embraced by institutions, this SPAC transaction signals growing demand for Ethereum-backed equity offerings. The listing is scheduled for completion in the fourth quarter of 2025. Ether-backed equities gain traction amid regulatory clarity Ether has seen strong performance in recent weeks, with the price hitting a six-month high last Friday. Part of this momentum is attributed to increasing regulatory clarity in the US, particularly surrounding US dollar-pegged stablecoins. Many of these stablecoins operate on the Ethereum blockchain, reinforcing Ether‚Äôs foundational role in decentralised finance (DeFi) and stable asset issuance. This regulatory environment is enabling more crypto-native firms to explore equity markets as a route to raise capital. By bringing Ethereum directly onto the balance sheet and offering public exposure via shares, The Ether Machine aims to attract traditional investors who may be hesitant to engage directly with cryptocurrency wallets or decentralised exchanges. High-profile investors back Ethereum‚Äôs public market entry The Ether Machine‚Äôs SPAC merger has attracted contributions exceeding $800 million from a consortium of major crypto investors, including Blockchain.com, Kraken, and Pantera Capital. These funds were raised through an upsized common stock offering, boosting the total deal value to over $1.6 billion. Andrew Keys, former executive at Ethereum development studio ConsenSys, will serve as the chairman of The Ether Machine. Keys‚Äô prior affiliation with Joseph Lubin, Ethereum‚Äôs co-founder, positions him as a strategic choice to steer this ambitious initiative. His appointment signals the venture‚Äôs intent to maintain deep alignment with the Ethereum ecosystem. The company will trade on Nasdaq under the ticker symbol ‚ÄúETHM‚Äù once the transaction is finalised. Ether Machine mirrors Bitcoin strategy popularised by Saylor The Ether Machine is following a precedent set by firms like Strategy (previously known as MicroStrategy), which used corporate reserves to acquire Bitcoin and integrate it into its balance sheet. Under Michael Saylor‚Äôs leadership, Strategy became a case study in crypto accumulation as a corporate treasury strategy. This model is now being adapted for Ether, marking a potential shift in the digital asset hierarchy for public companies. The inclusion of 400,000 ETH‚Äîcurrently worth over $1.2 billion (¬£930 million) at market prices‚Äîpositions The Ether Machine at the centre of this evolution. It will hold more ETH than any other public firm to date. While the majority of recent institutional listings have prioritised Bitcoin exposure, the Ether Machine‚Äôs focus on Ethereum reflects the blockchain‚Äôs diverse use cases, ranging from smart contracts and decentralised applications to stablecoin settlements. ETH price rise fuels momentum as launch nears Dynamix Corporation‚Äôs shares more than doubled in premarket trading following the deal‚Äôs announcement, underlining investor enthusiasm for the listing. The Ether Machine is expected to benefit from Ethereum‚Äôs current market strength and broader industry developments such as anticipated Ethereum ETF approvals and renewed interest in DeFi protocols. The SPAC route offers a faster way to public markets compared to traditional IPOs. With the fourth-quarter target in sight, all eyes are now on the Ether Machine‚Äôs final balance sheet composition, Ethereum‚Äôs market valuation, and the timeline for its listing on Nasdaq under ‚ÄúETHM.‚Äù The Ethereum ecosystem has largely welcomed the move, seeing it as a pivotal step in closing the gap between crypto-native innovation and traditional market infrastructure. The post The Ether Machine to list on Nasdaq in $1.6B SPAC deal with 400K ETH appeared first on Invezz
